S04bsu022_u:1026: Lal_6.20 tat prayacchāmyahaṃ śrīmadveśma ratnamayaṃ śubham /
S04bsu022_u:1030: iti hi bhikṣavaḥ sarvaiḥ kāmāvacarraidaiveśvarairbodhisattvasya pūjārthaṃ kapilāhvaye mahāpuravare svakasvakāni gṛhāṇi māpitānyabhūvan /
S04bsu022_u:1031: rājñā capi śuddhodanena manuṣyātikrāntaṃ divyāsaṃprāptaṃ gṛhataraṃ pratisaṃskāritamabhūt /
S04bsu022_u:1032: tatra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahāvyūhasya samādheranubhāvena sarveṣu teṣu gṛheṣu māyādevīmupadarśayati sma /
S04bsu022_u:1033: abhyantaragataśca bodhisattvo māyādevyāḥ kukṣau dakṣiṇe pārśve paryaṅkamābhujya niṣaṇṇo 'bhūt /
S04bsu022_u:1034: sarve ca te deveśvarā ekaikamevaṃ saṃjānīte sma - mamaiva gṛhe bodhisattvamātā prativasati nānyatreti //
S04bsu022_u:1037: Lal_6.22 mahāvyūhāya sthitaḥ samādhiye acintiyā nirmita nirmiṇitvā /
S04bsu022_u:1038: sarveṣa devānabhiprāya pūritā nṛpasya pūrṇaśca tadā manorathaḥ //
S04bsu022_u:1039: atha khalu tasyāṃ devaparṣadi keṣāṃciddevaputrāṇāmetadabhavat - ye 'pi tāvaccāturmahārājakāyikā devāste 'pi tāvanmanuṣyāśrayagatatvena nirvidyāpakramanti /
S04bsu022_u:1040: kaḥ punarvādo ye tadanye udāratamā devāḥ trāyatriṃśā vā yāmā vā tuṣitā vā /
S04bsu022_u:1041: tatkathaṃ hi nāma sarvalokābhyudgato bodhisattvaḥ śucirnirāmagandhaḥ sattvaratnaḥ saṃtuṣitāddevanikāyāccyutvā durgandhe manuṣyāśraye daśamāsān mātuḥ kukṣau sthita iti //
S04bsu022_u:1042: atha khalvāyuṣmānānando buddhānubhāvena bhagavantametadavocat - āścaryaṃ bhagavan yāvajjugupsanīyaśca mātṛgrāmastathāgatenokto yāvadrāgacaritaśca /
S04bsu022_u:1044: kathaṃ hi nāma sarvalokābhyudgato bhagavān pūrvaṃ bodhisattvabhūta eva tuṣitāddevanikāyāccyavitvā manuṣyāśraye (durgandhe)
S04bsu022_u:1047: nāhaṃ bhagavan idamutsahe evaṃ vaktaṃ yathaiva pūrve bhagavatā vyākṛtamiti /
S04bsu022_u:1048: bhagavānāha - icchasi tvamānanda ratnavyūhaṃ bodhisattvaparibhogaṃ draṣṭuṃ yo mātuḥ kukṣigatasya bodhisattvasya paribhogo 'bhūt /
S04bsu022_u:1051: yattathāgatastaṃ bodhisattvaparibhogamupadarśayed yaṃ dṛṣṭvā prītiṃ vetsyāmaḥ //
S04bsu022_u:1053: yad brahmā sahāpatiḥ sārdhamaṣṭaṣaṣṭibrahmaśatasahasrairbrahmaloke 'ntarhito bhagavataḥ purataḥ pratyasthāt /
S04bsu022_u:1054: sa bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya bhagavantaṃ tripradakṣiṇīkṛtyaikānte 'sthāt prāñjalībhūto bhagavantaṃ namasyan /
S04bsu022_u:1055_0: tatra khalu bhagavān jānanneva brahmāṇaṃ sahāpatimāmantrayate sma - gṛhītastvayā
S04bsu022_u:1055_1: brahman sa bodhisattvaparibhogo daśamāsiko yo mama pūrvaṃ bodhisattvabhūtasya mātuḥ kukṣigatasyābhūt /
S04bsu022_u:1061: bhagavānāha - tena hi tvaṃ brahman upadarśaya taṃ daśamāsikaṃ bodhisattvaparibhogam,
S04bsu022_u:1063: atha khalu brahmā sahāpatistān brāhmaṇānetadavocat - tiṣṭhatu tāvadbhavanto yāvadvayaṃ ratnavyūhaṃ bodhisattvaparibhogamānayiṣyāmaḥ //
S04bsu022_u:1064: atha khalu brahmā sahāpatirbhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivanditvā bhagavataḥ purato 'ntarhitastatkṣaṇameva brahmaloke pratyasthāt //
S04bsu022_u:1065: atha khalu brahmā sahāpatiḥ subrahmāṇaṃ devaputrametadavocat - gaccha tvaṃ mārṣā ito brahmalokamupādāya yāvattrāyatriṃśadbhavanam - śabdamudīraya,
S04bsu022_u:1070_0: atha khalu brahmā sahāpatiścaturaśītyā devakoṭyā nayutaśatasahasraḥ sārdhaṃ taṃ ratnavyūhaṃ
S04bsu022_u:1070_1: bodhisattvaparibhogaṃ parigṛhya mahati brāhme vimāne triyojanaśatike pratiṣṭhāpyānekairdaivakoṭīnayutaśatasahasraiḥ
S04bsu022_u:1071: tena khalu punaḥ samayena kāmāvacarāṇāṃ devānāṃ mahāsaṃnipāto 'bhūt bhagavatsakāśe gantum /
S04bsu022_u:1072: sa khalu puna ratnavyūho bodhisattvaparibhogo divyairvastrairdivyairmālyairdivyairgandhairdivyaiḥ puṣpairdivyairvādyairdivyaiśca paribhaugairabhisaṃskṛto 'bhūt /
S04bsu022_u:1073: tāvanmaheśākhyaiśca devaiḥ parivṛto 'bhūd yacchakro devānāmindraḥ sumerau(samudre)
S04bsu022_u:1074: sthitvā dūrata eva mukhe tālacchatrakaṃ dattvā śīrṣavyavalokanenānuvilokayati sma unmeṣadhyāyikayā vā /
S04bsu022_u:1080: atha khalu bhagavāṃstaṃ divyaṃ vādyanirghoṣamantardhāpayati sma /
S04bsu022_u:1081: tatkasmāt? yatsahaśravaṇādeva jāmbudvīpakā manuṣyā unmādamāpatsyanta iti //
S04bsu022_u:1082: atha khalu catvāro mahārājānaḥ śakraṃ devānāmindramupasaṃkramyaivamāhuḥ - kathaṃ devānāmindra kariṣyāmo na labhāmahe ratnavyūhaṃ bodhisattvaparibhogaṃ draṣṭum /
S04bsu022_u:1085: api tu khalu punarmārṣā bhagavatsamīpamupanītaṃ drakṣyāmaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:1086: te tadā āhuḥ - tena hi devānāmindra tathā kuru yathāsya kṣipraṃ darśanaṃ bhavet /
S04bsu022_u:1087: śakra āha - āgamayata mārṣā muhūrtaṃ yāvadatikrāntātikrāntatamā devaputrā bhagavantaṃ pratisaṃmodayante sma /
S04bsu022_u:1089: atha khalu brahmā sahāpatiḥ sārdhaṃ taiścaturaśītyā devakoṭīnayutaśatasahasraistaṃ ratnavyūhaṃ bodhisattvaparibhogaṃ gṛhītvā yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāmayati sma /
S04bsu022_u:1090: sa khalu puna ratnavyūho bodhisattvaparibhogo 'bhirūpaḥ prāsādiko darśanīyaścaturasraścatuṣṭhūṇaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:1094: tasya khalu punaḥ kūtāgārasya madhye paryaṅkaḥ prajñaptaḥ tadyathāpi nāma ṣaṇmāsajātasya dārakasya bhittīphalakaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:1095: sa khalu puna ratnavyūho bodhisattvaparibhoga evaṃ varṇasaṃsthāno yasya na kaścit sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake sadṛśo 'sti ākṛtyā vā varṇena vā /
S04bsu022_u:1096: devāḥ khalvapi taṃ dṛṣṭvā āścaryaprāptā abhuvan /
S04bsu022_u:1098: sa ca tathāgatasyāntika upanīto 'tīva bhāsate tapati virocate sma /
S04bsu022_u:1099: tadyathāpi nāma dvinirdhāntaṃ suvarṇaṃ kuśalena karmakāreṇa supariniṣṭhitamapagatakācadoṣam,
S04bsu022_u:1102: tasmin khalu punarbodhisattvaparibhoge paryaṅkaḥ prajñapto yasya sadevake loke nāsti kaścit sadṛśo varṇena vā saṃsthānena vā anyatra kambugrīvāyā [Vaidya_49] bodhisattvasya /
S04bsu022_u:1104: tattasya bodhisattvaparyaṅkasyāgrato na bhāsate sma tadyathāpi nāma vātavṛṣṭyābhihataḥ kṛṣṇakambalaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:1105: sa khalu punaḥ kūṭāgāra uragasāracandanamayo yasyaikasuvarṇadharaṇī sāhasraṃ lokadhātuṃ mūlyaṃ kṣamate,
S04bsu022_u:1107: tādṛśa eva dvitīyaḥ kūṭāgāraḥ kṛto yastasmin prathame kūṭāgāre 'bhyantarataḥ asakto 'baddhasthitaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:1108: tādṛśa eva tṛtīyo 'pi kūṭāgāro yastasmin dvitīye kūṭāgāre 'bhyantare 'sakto 'baddhasthitaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:1109: sa ca paryaṅkastasmin gandhamaye tṛtīye kūṭāgāre vyavasthitaḥ saṃpraticchannaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:1110: tasya khalu punaruragasāracandanasyaivaṃrūpo varṇaḥ tadyathāpi nāma abhijātasya nīlaivaḍūryasya /
S04bsu022_u:1111: tasya khalu punargandhakūṭāgārasyopari samantādyāvanti kāniciddivyātikrāntāni puṣpāṇi santi,
S04bsu022_u:1112: tāni sarvāṇi tasmin kūṭāgāre bodhisattvasya pūrvakuśalamūlavipākenānuprāptānyeva jāyante sma /
S04bsu022_u:1113: sa khalu puna ratnavyūho bodhisattvaparibhogo dṛḍhasāro 'bhedyo vajropamaḥ sparśena ca kācilindikasukhasaṃsparśaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:1114: tasmin khalu puna ratnavyūhe bodhisattvaparibhoge ye kecit kāmāvacarāṇāṃ devānāṃ bhavanavyūhāste sarve tasmin saṃdṛśyante sma //
S04bsu022_u:1115: yāmeva ca rātriṃ bodhisattvo mātuḥ kukṣimavakrāntastāmeva rātrimadha āpaskandhamupādāya aṣṭaṣaṣṭiyojanaśatasahasrāṇi mahāpṛthivīṃ bhittvā yāvad brahmalokaṃ padmabhyudgatamabhūt /
S04bsu022_u:1116: na ca kaścittaṃ padmaṃ paśyati sma anyatra sārathinarottamāddaśaśatasāhasrikācca mahābrahmaṇaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:1117: yacceha trisāhasramahāsāhasralokadhātāvojo vā maṇḍo va raso vā,
S04bsu022_u:1118: tatsarvaṃ tasmin mahāpadme madhubinduḥ saṃtiṣṭhate sma //
S04bsu022_u:1119: tamenaṃ mahābrahmā śubhe vaiḍūryabhājane prakṣipya bodhisattvasyopanāmayati sma /
S04bsu022_u:1120: taṃ bodhisattvaḥ parigṛhya bhuṅkte sma mahābrahmaṇo 'nukampāmupādāya /
S04bsu022_u:1121: nāsti sa kaścit sattvaḥ sattvanikāye yasya sa ojobinduḥ paribhuktaḥ samyak sukhena pariṇāmedanyatra caramabhavikādbodhisattvāt sarvabodhisattvabhūmiparipūrṇāt /
S04bsu022_u:1122: kasya ca karmaṇo vipākena sa ojobindurbodhisattvasyopatiṣṭhate sma?
S04bsu022_u:1123: dīrgharātraṃ khalvapi bodhisattvena pūrvaṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ caratā glānebhyaḥ sattvebhyo bhaiṣajyaṃ dattamāśatparāṇāṃ sattvānāmāśāḥ paripūritāḥ,
S04bsu022_u:1125: nityaṃ cāgrapuṣpamagraphalamagrarasaṃ tathāgatebhyastathāgatacaityebhyastathāgataśrāvakasaṃghebhyo mātāpitṛbhyaśca dattvā paścādātmanā paribhuktam /
S04bsu022_u:1126: tasya karmaṇo vipākena mahābrahmā bodhisattvasya taṃ madhubindumupanāmayati sma //
S04bsu022_u:1127: tasmin khalu punaḥ kūṭāgāre yāni kānicit santyatikrāntātikrāntāni māyāguṇaratikrīḍāsamavasṛtasthānāni,
S04bsu022_u:1128: tāni sarvāṇi tasmin prādurbhāvāni saṃdṛśyante sma bodhisattvasya pūrvakarmavipākena //
S04bsu022_u:1129: tasmin khalu puna ratnavyūhe bodhisattvaparibhoge śatasahasravyūhaṃ nāma vāsoyugaṃ prādurbhūtam /
S04bsu022_u:1130: na sa kaścitsattvaḥ sattvanikāye saṃvidyate yasya tatprādurbhavedanyatra caramabhavikād bodhisattvāt /
S04bsu022_u:1131: [Vaidya_50] na ca te kecana udārodārā rūpaśabdagandharasasparśā ye tasmin kūṭāgāre na saṃdṛśyante sma /
S04bsu022_u:1132: sacetkūṭāgāraparibhoga evaṃ suparibhoga evaṃ supariniṣpannaḥ sāntarabahirevaṃ supariniṣṭhita evaṃ mṛdukaśca /
S04bsu022_u:1135_0: dharmatā khalveṣā bodhisattvasya pūrvakeṇa ca praṇidhānena iyaṃ cetanā ṛddhāvavaśyaṃ
S04bsu022_u:1135_1: bodhisattvena mahāsattvena manuṣyaloka upapattavyamabhiniṣkramya cānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhya
S04bsu022_u:1139: na hi caramabhavikasya bodhisattvasya kalalārbudaghanapeśībhāvaṃ kāyaḥ saṃtiṣṭhate sma /
S04bsu022_u:1140: atha tarhi sarvāṅgapratyaṅgalakṣaṇasaṃpannaḥ saṃniṣaṇṇa eva prādurbhavati /
S04bsu022_u:1141: svapnāntaragatā ca bodhisattvamātā māyādevī mahānāgakuñjaramavakrāntaṃ saṃjānīte sma //
S04bsu022_u:1142_0: tasya khalu punastathā niṣaṇṇasya śakro devānāmindraścatvāraśca mahārājāno 'ṣṭāviṃśatiśca
S04bsu022_u:1142_1: mahāyakṣasenāpatayo guhyakādhipatiśca nāma yakṣakulaṃ yato vajrapāṇerutpattiste bodhisattvaṃ
S04bsu022_u:1142_2: mātuḥ kukṣigataṃ viditvā satataṃ samitamanubaddhā bhavanti sma /
S04bsu022_u:1143: santi khalu punaścatasro bodhisattvaparicārakā devatāḥ - utkhalī ca nāma samutkhalī ca nāma dhvajavatī ca nāma prabhāvatī ca nāma /
S04bsu022_u:1144: tā api bodhisattvaṃ mātuḥ kukṣigataṃ viditvā satataṃ samitaṃ rakṣanti sma /
S04bsu022_u:1145: śakro 'pi devānāmindraḥ sārdhaṃ pañcamātrairdevaputraśatairbodhisattvaṃ mātuḥ kukṣigataṃ jñātvā satataṃ samitamanubadhnāti sma //
S04bsu022_u:1147: tadyathāpi nāma parvatamūrdhani rātrāvandhakāratamisrāyāṃ mahānagniskandho yojanādapi dṛśyate sma,
S04bsu022_u:1149: evameva bodhisattvasya mātuḥ kukṣigatasyātmabhāvo 'bhinirvṛtto 'bhūt prabhāsvaro 'bhirūpaḥ prāsādiko darśanīyaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:1150: sa tasmin kūṭāgāre paryaṅkaniṣaṇṇo 'tīva śobhate sma /
S04bsu022_u:1152: bodhisattvasya mātā ca nidhyāya sthitā paśyati sma kukṣigataṃ bodhisattvam /
S04bsu022_u:1153: tadyathāpi nāma mahato 'bhrakūṭādvidyuto niḥsṛtya mahāntamavabhāsaṃ saṃjanayanti,
S04bsu022_u:1154: evameva bodhisattvo mātuḥ kukṣigataḥ śriyā tejasā varṇena ca taṃ prathamaṃ ratnakūṭāgāramavabhāsayati sma /
S04bsu022_u:1158: tamavabhāsya yatra cāsane niṣaṇṇo bhavati sma tadavabhāsayati sma /
S04bsu022_u:1160: sarvaṃ gṛhamavabhāsya gṛhasyopariṣṭānniḥsṛtya pūrvāṃ diśamavabhāsayati sma /
S04bsu022_u:1161: evaṃ dakṣiṇāṃ paścimāṃ uttarāmadha ūrdhvaṃ samantāddaśadiśaḥ krośamātramekaikasyāṃ diśi mātuḥ kukṣigato bodhisattvaḥ śriyā tejasā varṇena cāvabhāsayati sma //
S04bsu022_u:1163_0: āgacchanti sma khalu punarbhikṣavaścatvāro mahārājāno 'ṣṭāviṃśacca mahāyakṣasenāpatayaḥ
S04bsu022_u:1163_1: sārdhaṃ pañcamātrayakṣaśataiḥ pūrvāhṇakālasamaye bodhisattvasya darśanāya vandanāya
S04bsu022_u:1164: tadā bodhisattvastānāgatān viditvā dakṣiṇaṃ pāṇimabhyutkṣipya ekāṅgulikayā āsanānyupadarśayati sma /
S04bsu022_u:1166: paśyanti sma bodhisattvaṃ mātuḥ kukṣigataṃ jātarūpamiva vigrahaṃ hastaṃ cālayantaṃ vicālayantam utkṣipantaṃ pratiṣṭhāpayantam /
S04bsu022_u:1168: niṣaṇṇāṃśca tān viditvā bodhisattvo dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśayati sma samādāpayati sma samuttejayati sma saṃpraharṣayati sma /
S04bsu022_u:1169: yadā ca prakramitukāmā bhavanti tadā bodhisattvasteṣāṃ cetasaiva vicintitaṃ vijñāya dakṣiṇaṃ pāṇimutkṣipya saṃcārayati sma /
S04bsu022_u:1172: tadā teṣāṃ caturṇāṃ mahārājānāmevaṃ bhavati sma - visarjitāḥ sma vayaṃ bodhisattveneti /
S04bsu022_u:1173: te bodhisattvaṃ bodhisattvamātaraṃ ca tripradakṣiṇīkṛtya prakrāmanti sma /
S04bsu022_u:1174: ayaṃ heturayaṃ pratyayo yadbodhisattvo rātryāṃ praśāntāyāṃ dakṣiṇaṃ pāṇiṃ saṃcārya vicārayati sma /
S04bsu022_u:1175: vicārya punarapi smṛtaḥ saṃprajānaṃstaṃ pāṇiṃ pratiṣṭhāpayati sma /
S04bsu022_u:1176: punaraparaṃ yadā bodhisattvasya keciddarśanāyāgacchanti sma striyo vā puruṣo vā dārako vā dārikā vā,
S04bsu022_u:1179: iti hi bhikṣavo bodhisattvo mātuḥ kukṣigataḥ san sattvān pratisaṃmodanakuśalo bhavati smeti /
S04bsu022_u:1180: na ca kaściddevo vā nāgo vā yakṣo vā manuṣyo vā amanuṣyo vā yaḥ śaknoti sma bodhisattvaṃ pūrvataraṃ pratisaṃmoditum /
S04bsu022_u:1181: atha tarhi bodhisattva eva tāvat pūrvataraṃ pratisaṃmodate sma,
S04bsu022_u:1183: nirgate khalu punaḥ pūrvāhṇakālasamaye madhyāhnakālasamaye pratyupasthite atha khalu śakro devānāmindro niṣkrāntaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:1184: abhiniṣkrāntāśca trāyatriṃśaddevaputrā bodhisattvasya darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya /
S04bsu022_u:1186: tāṃśca bodhisattvo dūrata evāgacchato dṛṣṭvā dakṣiṇaṃ suvarṇavarṇaṃ bāhuṃ prasārya śakraṃ devānāmindraṃ devāṃśca trāyatriṃśān pratisaṃmodate sma /
S04bsu022_u:1188: na ca śaknoti sma bhikṣavaḥ śakro devānāmindro bodhisattvasyājñāṃ pratiroddhum /
S04bsu022_u:1189: niṣīdati sma śakro devānāmindrastadanye ca devaputrā yathāprajñapteṣvāsaneṣu /
S04bsu022_u:1190: tān bodhisattvo niṣaṇṇān viditvā dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśayati sma samādāpayati sma samuttejayati sma saṃpraharṣayati sma /
S04bsu022_u:1191: yena ca bodhisattvaḥ pāṇiṃ saṃcārayati sma,
S04bsu022_u:1193: tatasteṣāmevaṃ bhavati sma - asmābhiḥ sārdhaṃ bodhisattvaḥ saṃmodate sma /
S04bsu022_u:1194: ekaikaścaivaṃ saṃjānīte sma - mayaiva sārdhaṃ bodhisattvaḥ saṃlapati,
S04bsu022_u:1197: tasmin khalu punaḥ kūṭāgāre śakrasya devānāmindrasya trāyatriṃśānāṃ devānāṃ ca pratibhāsaḥ saṃdṛśyate sma /
S04bsu022_u:1198: na khalu punaranyatraivaṃ pariśuddho bodhisattvaparibhogo bhavati yathā mātuḥ kukṣigatasya bodhisattvasya /
S04bsu022_u:1199: yadā ca bhikṣavaḥ śakro devānāmindrastadanye ca devaputrāḥ prakramitukāmā bhavanti sma,
S04bsu022_u:1200: tadā bodhisattvasteṣāṃ cetasaiva cetaḥparivitarkamājñāya dakṣiṇaṃ pāṇimutkṣipya saṃcārayanti sma /
S04bsu022_u:1201: saṃcārya vicārya punarapi smṛtaḥ saṃprajānan pratiṣṭhāpayati sma /
S04bsu022_u:1203: tadā śakrasya devānāmindrasyānyeṣāṃ ca trāyatriṃśānāṃ devānāmevaṃ bhavati sma - visarjitā vayaṃ bodhisattveneti /
S04bsu022_u:1204: te bodhisattvaṃ bodhisattvamātaraṃ ca tripradakṣiṇīkṛtya prakrāmanti sma //
S04bsu022_u:1205_0: nirgate ca khalu punarbhikṣavo madhyāhnakālasamaye sāyāhnakālasamaye pratyupasthite
S04bsu022_u:1205_2: puraskṛtastaṃ divyamojobindumādāya yena bodhisattvastenopasaṃkrāmati sma bodhisattvaṃ
S04bsu022_u:1205_3: draṣṭuṃ vandituṃ paryupāsituṃ dharmaṃ ca śrotum /
S04bsu022_u:1206: samanvāharati sma bhikṣavaḥ bodhisattvo brahmāṇaṃ sahāpatimāgacchantaṃ saparivāram /
S04bsu022_u:1207: punareva ca bodhisattvo dakṣiṇaṃ suvarṇavarṇapāṇimutkṣipya brahmāṇaṃ sahāpatiṃ brahmakāyikāṃśca devaputrān pratisaṃmodate sma /
S04bsu022_u:1209: na ca śaktirasti bhikṣavo brahmaṇaḥ sahāpaterbodhisattvasyājñāṃ pratiroddhum /
S04bsu022_u:1210: niṣīdati sma bhikṣavo brahmā sahāpatistadanye ca brahmakāyikā devaputrā yathāprajñapteṣvāsaneṣu /
S04bsu022_u:1211: tān bodhisattvo niṣaṇṇān viditvā dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśayati sma samādāpayati sma samuttejayati sma saṃpraharṣayati sma /
S04bsu022_u:1212: yena ca bodhisattvaḥ pāṇiṃ saṃcārayati sma,
S04bsu022_u:1214: tatasteṣāmekaikasyaivaṃ bhavati sma - mayā sārdhaṃ bodhisattvaḥ saṃlapati,
S04bsu022_u:1216: yadā ca brahmā sahāpatistadanye ca brahmakāyikā devaputrā gantukāmā bhavanti sma,
S04bsu022_u:1217: tadā bodhisattvasteṣāṃ cetasaiva cetaḥparivitarkamājñāya dakṣiṇaṃ suvarṇavarṇaṃ bāhumutkṣipya saṃcārayati sma /
S04bsu022_u:1219: saṃcārya vicārya avasādatākāreṇa pāṇiṃ saṃcārayati sma /
S04bsu022_u:1221: tato brahmaṇaḥ sahāpatestadanyeṣāṃ ca brahmakāyikānāṃ devaputrāṇāmevaṃ bhavati sma - visarjitā vayaṃ bodhisattveneti /
S04bsu022_u:1222: te bodhisattvaṃ bodhisattvamātaraṃ ca tripradakṣiṇīkṛtya punareva prakrāmanti sma /
S04bsu022_u:1223: bodhisattvaśca smṛtaḥ saṃprajānan pāṇiṃ pratiṣṭhāpayati sma //
S04bsu022_u:1224_0: āgacchanti sma khalu punarbhikṣavaḥ pūrvadakṣiṇapaścimottarābhyo digbhyo 'dhastādupariṣṭāt
S04bsu022_u:1224_1: santāddaśabhyo digbhyo bahūni bodhisattvaśatasahasrāṇi bodhisattvasya darśanāya vandanāya
S04bsu022_u:1225: teṣāmāgatāgatānāṃ bodhisattvaḥ kāyāt prabhāmutsṛjya prabhāvyūhāni siṃhāsanānyabhinirmimīte sma /
S04bsu022_u:1227: niṣaṇṇāṃścainān viditvā paripṛcchati sma paripraśnayati sma yadutāsyaiva bodhisattvasya mahāyānasya vistaravibhāgatāmupādāya /
S04bsu022_u:1228: na ca tān kaścidanyaḥ paśyati sma anyatra sabhāgebhyo devaputrebhyaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:1229: ayaṃ bhikṣavo heturayaṃ pratyayo yena bodhisattvaḥ praśāntāyāṃ rātryāṃ kāyāt prabhāmutsṛjati sma //
S04bsu022_u:1231: na khalu punarbhikṣavo māyādevī bodhisattvakukṣigate gurukāyatāṃ saṃjānīte sma anyatra laghutāmeva mṛdutāmeva saukhyatāmeva /
S04bsu022_u:1233: na ca rāgaparidāhena vā dveṣaparidāhena vā mohaparidāhena vā paridahyate sma /
S04bsu022_u:1234: na ca kāmavitarkaṃ vā vyāpādavitarkaṃ vā vihiṃsāvitarkaṃ vā vitarkayati sma /
S04bsu022_u:1235: na ca śītaṃ na coṣṇaṃ vā jighatsāṃ vā pipāsāṃ vā tamo vā rajo vā kleśaṃ vā saṃjānīte sma paśyati vā /
S04bsu022_u:1236: na cāsyā amanāpā rūpaśabdagandharasasparśā vā ābhāsamāgacchanti sma /
S04bsu022_u:1237: na ca pāpakān svapnān paśyati sma /
S04bsu022_u:1238: na cāsyāḥ strīmāyā na śāṭhyaṃ nerṣyā na strīkleśā bādhante sma /
S04bsu022_u:1239: pañcaśikṣāpadasamādattā khalu punaḥ śīlavatī daśakuśalakarmapathe pratiṣṭhitā tasmin samaye bodhisattvamātā bhavati sma /
S04bsu022_u:1240: na ca bodhisattvamātuḥ kvacit puruṣe rāgacittamutpadyate sma,
S04bsu022_u:1242: ye ca kecitkapilāhvaye mahāpuravare anyeṣu vā janapadeṣu devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍabhūtāviṣṭāḥ strīpuruṣadārakadārikā vā,
S04bsu022_u:1243: te sarve bodhisattvamātuḥ sahadarśanādeva svasthāḥ smṛtipratilabdhā bhavanti sma /
S04bsu022_u:1245: ye ca kecinnānārogaspṛṣṭāḥ sattvā bhavanti sma,
S04bsu022_u:1247_0: cakṣurogeṇa vā śrotrarogeṇa vā ghrāṇarogeṇa vā jihvārogeṇa vā oṣṭharogeṇa vā dantarogeṇa
S04bsu022_u:1248: teṣāṃ bodhisattvamātā dakṣiṇapāṇiṃ mūrdhni pratiṣṭhāpayati sma /
S04bsu022_u:1249: te sahapratiṣṭhāpite pāṇau vigatavyādhayo bhūtvā svakasvakāni gṛhāṇi gacchanti sma /
S04bsu022_u:1250: antato māyādevī tṛṇagulmakamapi dharaṇitalādabhyutkṣipya glānebhyaḥ sattvebhyo 'nuprayacchati sma /
S04bsu022_u:1252: yadā ca māyādevī svaṃ dakṣiṇaṃ pārśvaṃ pratyavekṣate sma,
S04bsu022_u:1254: tadyathāpi nāma supariśuddha ādarśamaṇḍale mukhamaṇḍalaṃ dṛśyate /
S04bsu022_u:1255: dṛṣṭvā ca punastuṣṭā udagrā āttamanā pramuditā prītisaumanasyajātā bhavati sma //
S04bsu022_u:1256: bodhisattvasya khalu punarbhikṣavo mātuḥ kukṣigatasyādhiṣṭhitaṃ satataṃ samitaṃ rātriṃdivaṃ divyāni tūryāṇi abhi(nirmāya)
S04bsu022_u:1261: kālena ṛtavo nakṣatrāṇi ca parivartante sma /
S04bsu022_u:1262: kṣemaṃ ca rājyaṃ subhikṣaṃ ca sumanākulamanubhavati sma /
S04bsu022_u:1263: sarve ca kapilāhvaye mahāpuravare śākyā anye ca sattvāḥ khādanti sma,
S04bsu022_u:1271: rājāpi śuddhodanaḥ saṃprāptabrahmacaryoparatarāṣṭrakāryo 'pi supariśuddhastapovanagata iva dharmamevānuvartate sma //
S04bsu022_u:1273: evaṃrūpeṇa bhikṣava ṛddhiprātihāryeṇa samanvāgato bodhisattvo mātuḥ kukṣigato 'sthāt /
S04bsu022_u:1274: tatra khalu bhagavānāyuṣmantamānandamāmantrayate sma - drakṣyasi tvamānanda ratnavyūhaṃ bodhisattvaparibhogaṃ yatra bodhisattvo mātuḥ kukṣigato vyāhārṣīt /
S04bsu022_u:1276: darśayati sma tathāgata āyuṣmata ānandasya śakrasya devānāmindrasya caturṇāṃ ca lokapālānāṃ tadanyeṣāṃ ca devamanuṣyāṇām /
S04bsu022_u:1277: dṛṣṭvā ca te tuṣṭā abhūvan udagrā āttamanasaḥ pramuditāḥ prītisaumanasyajātāḥ /
S04bsu022_u:1278: sa ca brahmā sahāpatiḥ punareva brahmaloke samāropya pratiṣṭhāpayati sma caityārtham //
S04bsu022_u:1279: tatra khalu bhagavān punarapi bhikṣūnāmantrayate sma - iti hi bhikṣavo daśamāsakukṣigatena bodhisattvena ṣaṭtriṃśannayutāni devamanuṣyāṇāṃ triṣu yāneṣu paripācitānyabhūvan /
S04bsu022_u:1281: Lal_6.23 bodhisattva agrasattva mātukukṣisaṃsthitaḥ prakampitā ca ṣaḍvikāra medinī sakānanā /
S04bsu022_u:1282: suvarṇavarṇa ābha mukta sarvāpāya śodhitā praharṣitāśca devasaṃgha dharmagañju bheṣyate //
S04bsu022_u:1283: Lal_6.24 suṃsaṃsthito mahāvimānu naikaratnacitrito yatra vīru āruhitva tiṣṭhate vināyakaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:1284: gandhottamena candanena pūrito virocate yasyaikakarṣu trisahasramūlyaratnapūrito //
S04bsu022_u:1285: Lal_6.25 mahāsahasralokadhātu heṣvi bhindiyitvanā udāgato guṇākarasya padmaojabinduko /
S04bsu022_u:1286: so saptarātra puṇyateja brahmaloki udgato gṛhītva brahma ojabindu bodhisattva nāmayī //
S04bsu022_u:1287: Lal_6.26 na asti sarvasattvakāyi bhuktu yo jareya taṃ anyatra bhūri bodhisattva brahmakalpasaṃnibhe /
S04bsu022_u:1288: anekakalpa puṇyateja ojabindu saṃsthito bhujitva sattva kāyacitta jñānaśuddha gacchiṣu //
S04bsu022_u:1289: Lal_6.27 śakra brahma lokapāla pūjanāya nāyakaṃ trīṇi kāla āgamitva bodhisattvamantikam /
S04bsu022_u:1290: vandayitva pūjayitva dharma śṛṇute varaṃ pradakṣiṇaṃ karitva sarva gacchiṣū yathāgatā //
S04bsu022_u:1296: Lal_6.29 ye ca iṣṭidārakāsu duḥkhitā tadā abhūt bhūtaspṛṣṭa kṣiptacitta nagna pāṃśumrakṣitā /
S04bsu022_u:1297: te ca sarva dṛṣṭva māya bhonti labdhacetanā smṛtīmatīgatīupeta gehi gehi gacchiṣu //
S04bsu022_u:1298: Lal_6.30 vātato va pittato va śleṣmasaṃnipātakaiḥ ye ca cakṣuroga śrotraroga kāyacittapīḍitā /
S04bsu022_u:1299: naikarūpa naikajāti vyādhibhiśca ye hatā sthāpite sma māya mūrdhni pāṇi bhonti nirjarā //
S04bsu022_u:1300: Lal_6.31 athāpi vā tṛṇasya tūli bhūmito gṛhītvanā dadāti māya āturāṇa sarvi bhonti nirjarā /
S04bsu022_u:1301: saukhyaprāpti nirvikāra gehi gehi gacchiṣu bhaiṣajyabhūti vaidyarāji kukṣisaṃpratiṣṭhite //
S04bsu022_u:1302: Lal_6.32 yasmi kāli māyadevi svātanuṃ nirīkṣate adṛśāti bodhisattva kukṣiye pratiṣṭhitam /
S04bsu022_u:1303: yathaiva candra antarīkṣa tārakai parīvṛtaṃ tathaiva nāthu bodhisattvalakṣaṇairalaṃkṛtam //
S04bsu022_u:1304: Lal_6.33 no ca tasya rāga doṣa naiva moha bādhate kāmachandu naiva tasya īrṣi naiva hiṃsitā /
S04bsu022_u:1305: tuṣṭacitta hṛṣṭacitta prīti saumanasthitā kṣudhāpipāsa śīta uṣṇa naiva tasya bādhate //
S04bsu022_u:1306: Lal_6.34 aghaṭṭitāśca nityakāla divyatūrya vādiṣu pravarṣayanti divyapuṣpa gandhaśreṣṭha śobhanā /
S04bsu022_u:1307: deva paśyi mānuṣāśca mānuṣā amānuṣāṃ no viheṭhi no vihiṃsi tatra te parasyaram //
S04bsu022_u:1308: Lal_6.35 [Vaidya_56]ramanti sattva krīḍayanti annapānudenti ca ānandaśabda ghoṣayanti hṛṣṭatuṣṭamānasāḥ //
S04bsu022_u:1309: kṣamā rajoanākulā ca kāli deva varṣate tṛṇāśca puṣpa oṣadhīya tasmi kāli rohiṣu //
S04bsu022_u:1310: Lal_6.36 rājagehi saptarātra ratnavarṣa varṣito yato daridrasattva gṛhya dāna denti bhuñjate /
S04bsu022_u:1311: nāsti sattva yo daridra yo ca āsi duḥkhito bherumūrdhni nandaneva eva sattva nandiṣu //
S04bsu022_u:1312: Lal_6.37 so ca rāju śākiyāna poṣadhī upoṣito rājyakāryu no karoti dharmameva gocarī /
S04bsu022_u:1313: tapovanaṃ ca so praviṣṭa māyādevī pṛcchate kīdṛśenti kāyi saukhya agrasattva dhārati //
S04bsu022_u:1319: iti hi bhikṣavo daśamāseṣu nigateṣu bodhisattvasya janmakālasamaye pratyupasthite rājñaḥ śuddhodanasya gṛhodyāne dvātriṃśatpūrvanimittāni prādurabhūvan /
S04bsu022_u:1322: puṣkariṇīṣu cotpalapadmakumudapuṇḍarīkāṇyabhyudgatāni kuḍmalībhūtāni na puṣpanti sma /
S04bsu022_u:1323: tadā ca puṣpaphalavṛkṣā dharaṇītalādabhyudgamya kṣārakajātā na phalanti sma /
S04bsu022_u:1325: viṃśati ca ratnanidhānaśatasahasrāṇyutplatya vyavasthitāni dṛśyante sma /
S04bsu022_u:1328: himavatparvatapārśvācca siṃhapotakā āgatyāgatyābhinadantaḥ kapilāhvayapuravaraṃ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya dvāramūleṣvavatiṣṭhante sma,
S04bsu022_u:1330: pañcaśatāni pāṇḍarāṇāṃ hastiśāvakānāmāgatya rājñaḥ śuddhodanasyāgrakaraiścaraṇāvabhilikhanti sma /
S04bsu022_u:1331: mekhalībaddhakāśca devadārakā rājñaḥ śuddhodanasyāntaḥpure utsaṅgenotsaṅgamanuparivartamānāḥ saṃdṛśyante sma /
S04bsu022_u:1332: gaganatalagatārdhakāyā nāgakanyā nānāpūjopakaraṇaparigṛhītā adhyālambamānāḥ saṃdṛśyante sma /
S04bsu022_u:1333: daśa ca nāgakanyāsahasrāṇi mayūrāṅgahastakaparigṛhītā gagatatale 'vasthitāḥ saṃdṛśyante sma /
S04bsu022_u:1334: daśa ca pūrṇakumbhasahasrāṇi kapilavastu mahānagaraṃ pradakṣiṇīkurvanti saṃdṛśyante sma /
S04bsu022_u:1335: daśa ca devakanyāsahasrāṇi gandhodakabhṛṅgāraparigṛhītā mūrdhni dhārayantyo 'vasthitāḥ saṃdṛśyante sma /
S04bsu022_u:1336: daśa ca devakanyāsahasrāṇi chatradhvajapatākāparigṛhītā avasthitāḥ saṃdṛśyate sma /
S04bsu022_u:1337: bahūni cāpsaraḥśatasahasrāṇi śaṅkhabherīmṛdaṅgapaṇavaiḥ ghaṇṭāvasaktaiḥ pratīkṣamāṇānyavasthitāni saṃdṛśyante sma /
S04bsu022_u:1339: sarvanadī ca prasravaṇāni ca na vahanti sma /
S04bsu022_u:1342: ratnajālaparisphuṭaṃ ca rājñaḥ śuddhodanasya gṛhaṃ saṃsthitamabhūt /
S04bsu022_u:1344: kūṭāgāraprāsādatoraṇadvārakataleṣu ca maṇiratnānyabhipralambamānāni ca saṃdṛśyante sma /
S04bsu022_u:1349: utkūlanikūlāśca pṛthivīpradeśāḥ samāḥ samavasthitāḥ sarvavīthīcatvaraśṛṅgāṭakarathyāntarāpaṇamukhāni ca pāṇitalamṛṣṭānīva puṣpābhikīrṇāni virocante sma /
S04bsu022_u:1351: sarvaśālavanadevatāśca patreṣvardhakāyānabhinirmāya namyamānāḥ sthitāḥ saṃdṛśyante sma /
S04bsu022_u:1354: atha khalu māyādevī bodhisattvasya janmakālasamayaṃ jñātvā bodhisattvasyaiva tejonubhāvena rātryāṃ prathame yāme rājānaṃ śuddhodanamupasaṃkramya gāthābhirabhyabhāṣata -
S04bsu022_u:1355: Lal_7.1 deva śṛṇu hi mahyaṃ bhāṣato yaṃ mataṃ me aciraciracireṇā jāta udyānabuddhiḥ /
S04bsu022_u:1356: yadi ca tava na roṣo naiva doṣo na mohaḥ kṣipramahu vrajeyā krīḍaudyānabhūmim //
S04bsu022_u:1357: Lal_7.2 tvamiha tapasi khinno dharmacittaprayukto ahu ca cirapraviṣṭā śuddhasattvaṃ dharentī /
S04bsu022_u:1358: drumavara pratibuddhāḥ phullitā śālavṛkṣāḥ yukta bhaviya devā gantumudyānabhūmim //
S04bsu022_u:1359: Lal_7.3 ṛtupravara vasanto yoṣitāṃ maṇḍanīyo bhramaravaravighuṣṭāḥ kokilabarhigītāḥ /
S04bsu022_u:1360: śuciruciravicitrā bhrāmyate puṣpareṇuḥ sādhu dadahi ājñāṃ gacchamo mā vilambaḥ //
S04bsu022_u:1365: Lal_7.5 nīlagirinikāśāṃ meghavarṇānubaddhāṃ viṃśati ca sahasrān yojayadhvaṃ gajānām /
S04bsu022_u:1367: Lal_7.6 himarajatanikāśāṃ muñjakeśāṃ sukeśāṃ viṃśati ca sahasrān yojayadhvaṃ hayānām /
S04bsu022_u:1369: Lal_7.7 naragaṇa raṇaśauṇḍān śūra saṃgrāmakāmān asidhanuśaraśaktipāśakhaḍgāgrahastān /
S04bsu022_u:1370: viṃśati ca sahasrān yojayadhvaṃ suśīghraṃ māya saparivārāṃ rakṣathā apramattā //
S04bsu022_u:1371: Lal_7.8 [Vaidya_59]maṇikanakaniṣiktāṃ lumbinīṃ kārayadhvaṃ vividhavasanaratnaiḥ sarvavṛkṣāṃ pravethā /
S04bsu022_u:1372: vividhakusumacitraṃ nandanaṃ vā surāṇāṃ vadatha ca mama śīghraṃ sarvametaṃ vidhāya //
S04bsu022_u:1373: vacanamimu niśamyā pāriṣadyaiḥ kṣaṇena vāhana kṛta sajjā lumbinī maṇḍitā sā /
S04bsu022_u:1375: Lal_7.9 jaya jaya hi narendrā āyu pālehi dīrghaṃ sarva kṛtu yathoktaṃ kāru deva pratīkṣa //
S04bsu022_u:1376: Lal_7.10 so ca naravarendro hṛṣṭacitto bhavitvā gṛhavaramanuviṣṭo iṣṭikānevamāha /
S04bsu022_u:1377: yasya ahu manāpo yā ca me prītikāmā sā mi kuruta ājñāṃ maṇḍayitvātmabhāvam //
S04bsu022_u:1378: Lal_7.11 varasurabhisugandhāṃ bhāvaraṅgāṃ vicitrāṃ vasana mṛdumanojñāṃ prāvṛṇothā udagrāḥ /
S04bsu022_u:1379: urasi vigalitānāṃ muktahārā bhavethā ābharaṇavibhūṣāṃ darśayethādya sarvāḥ //

S04bsu022_u:2145: candrāditya prabhaṃkarā prabhakarā khadyotake no name
S04bsu022_u:2147: yadvat sarṣapa goṣpade va salilaṃ khadyotakā vā bhavet
S04bsu022_u:2148: evaṃ ca trisahasra devamanujā ye keci mānāśritāḥ /
S04bsu022_u:2150: yaṃ loko hyabhivandya lābha labhate svargaṃ tathā nirvṛtim //
S04bsu022_u:2151: asmin khalu punarbhikṣavo bodhisattvena mahāsattvena devakule praveśe saṃdarśyamāne dvātriṃśatāṃ devaputraśatasahasrāṇāmanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittānyutpadyante /
S04bsu022_u:2152: ayaṃ bhikṣavo heturayaṃ pratyayo yenopekṣako bodhisattvo bhavati sma devakulamupanīyamāna iti //
S04bsu022_u:2158: atha khalu bhikṣava udayano nāma brāhmaṇo rājñaḥ purohita udāyinaḥ pitā,
S04bsu022_u:2159: sa pañcamātrairbrāhmaṇaśataiḥ parivṛto hastottare citrānakṣatre rājānaṃ śuddhodanamupasaṃkramyaivamāha - yatkhalu devo jānīyādābharaṇāni kumārāya kriyantāmiti /
S04bsu022_u:2162: tatra rājñā śuddhodanena pañcamātraiśca śakyaśataiḥ pañcamātrāṇyābharaṇaśatāni kāritānyabhūvan /
S04bsu022_u:2163_0: tadyathā - hastābharaṇāni pādābharaṇāni mūrdhābharaṇāni kaṇṭhābharaṇāni mudrikābharaṇāni
S04bsu022_u:2163_2: pādukā nānāratnasamalaṃkṛtā hārāḥ kaṭakā harṣā mukuṭāni /
S04bsu022_u:2164: kārayitvā ca puṣyanakṣatrayogenānuyuktena te śākyā rājānaṃ śuddhodanamupasaṃkramyaivamāhuḥ - hanta deva maṇḍyatāṃ kumāra iti /
S04bsu022_u:2165: rājā āha - alamalaṃkṛtaśca pūjitaśca bhavadbhiḥ kumāraḥ /
S04bsu022_u:2170: tatra rātrau vinirgatāyāmāditya udite vimalavyūhanāmodyānaṃ tatra bodhisattvo nirgato 'bhūt /
S04bsu022_u:2172: aśītiśca strīsahasrāṇi pratyudgamya bodhisattvasya vadanaṃ prekṣante sma /
S04bsu022_u:2173: daśa ca kanyāsahasrāṇi pratyudgamya bodhisattvasya vadanaṃ prekṣante sma /
S04bsu022_u:2174: pañca ca brāhmaṇasahasrāṇi pratyudgamya bodhisattvasya vadanaṃ prekṣante sma /
S04bsu022_u:2181: tadyathāpi nāma jāmbūnadasya suvarṇasya purato masipiṇḍa upanikṣipto na bhāsati na tapati na virocate,
S04bsu022_u:2182: evameva tānyābharaṇāni bodhisattvasya kāyaprabhayāspṛṣṭāni na bhāsante na tapanti na virocante sma /
S04bsu022_u:2183: evaṃ yā yā ābharaṇavikṛtirbodhisattvasya kāya ābadhyate sma,
S04bsu022_u:2184: sā sā jihmībhavati sma tadyathāpi nāma masipiṇḍaḥ //
S04bsu022_u:2185: tatra vimalā nāmodyānadevatā sā audārikamātmabhāvamabhisaṃdarśya purataḥ sthitvā rājānaṃ śuddhodanaṃ taṃ ca mahāntaṃ śākyagaṇaṃ gāthābhirabhibhāṣate sma -
S04bsu022_u:2186: Lal_9.1 sarveyaṃ trisahasra medinī sanagaranigamā pūrṇā kāñcanasaṃcitā bhavet surucira vimalā /
S04bsu022_u:2188: ekā kākiṇi jāmbukāñcane bhavati upahatā nā bhāsī itaraḥ sa kāñcana prabhasirirahitaḥ //
S04bsu022_u:2191: nā bhāsī na tapī na śobhate na ca prabhavati
S04bsu022_u:2192: ābhāye sugatasya kāyi no bhavati yatha masiḥ //
S04bsu022_u:2199: apanethā bharaṇā ma heṭhatā abudha budhakaraṃ
S04bsu022_u:2205: ityuktvā sā devatā bodhisattvaṃ divyaiḥ puṣpairabhyavakīrya tatraivāntaradhāt //
S04bsu022_u:2212: tadā māṅgalyaśatasahasraiḥ lipiśālāmupanīyate sma daśabhirdārakasahasraiḥ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛtaḥ,
S04bsu022_u:2216: bodhisattvaṃ prekṣamāṇāḥ kusumāni ca kṣipanti sma /
S04bsu022_u:2217: aṣṭau ca marutkanyāsahasrāṇi vigalitālaṃkārābharaṇālaṃkṛtāni ratnabhadraṃkareṇa gṛhītāni mārgaṃ śodhayantyo bodhisattvasya purato gacchanti sma /
S04bsu022_u:2219: sarve ca śākyagaṇāḥ śuddhodanaṃ rājānaṃ puraskṛtya bodhisattvasya purato gacchanti sma /
S04bsu022_u:2222: atha viśvāmitro nāma dārakācāryo bodhisattvasya śriyaṃ tejaścāsahamāno dharaṇitale niviṣṭo 'dhomukhaḥ prapatati sma /
S04bsu022_u:2223: taṃ tathā prapatitaṃ dṛṣṭvā śubhāṅgo nāma tuṣitakāyiko devaputro dakṣiṇena karatalena parigṛhyotthāpayati sma /
S04bsu022_u:2224: utthāpya ca gaganatalastho rājānaṃ śuddhodanaṃ taṃ ca mahāntaṃ janakāyaṃ gāthābhirabhyabhāṣat -
S04bsu022_u:2225: Lal_10.1 śāstrāṇi yāni pracalanti manuṣyaloke saṃkhyā lipiśca gaṇanāpi ca dhātutantram /
S04bsu022_u:2226: ye śilpayoga pṛthu laukika aprameyāḥ teṣveṣu śikṣitu purā bahukalpakoṭyaḥ //
S04bsu022_u:2227: Lal_10.2 kiṃ tū janasya anuvartanatāṃ karoti lipiśālamāgatu suśikṣitu śiṣyaṇārtham /
S04bsu022_u:2228: paripācanārtha bahudāraka agrayāne anyāṃśca sattvanayutānamṛte vinetum //
S04bsu022_u:2229: Lal_10.3 lokottareṣu catusatyapathe vidhijño hetupratītyakuśalo yatha saṃbhavanti /
S04bsu022_u:2230: yatha cānirodhakṣayu saṃsthitu śītibhāvaḥ tasminvidhijña kimatho lipiśāstramātre //
S04bsu022_u:2231: Lal_10.4 netasya ācariya uttari vā triloke sarveṣu devamanujeṣvayameva jeṣṭhaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:2233: nāmāpi teṣa lipināṃ na hi vittha yūyaṃ yatreṣu śikṣitu purā bahukalpakoṭyaḥ //
S04bsu022_u:2234: Lal_10.5 so cittadhāra jagatāṃ vividhā vicitrā ekakṣaṇena ayu jānati śuddhasattvaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:2235: adṛśyarūparahitasya gatiṃ ca vetti kiṃ vā puno 'tha lipino 'kṣaradṛśyarūpām //
S04bsu022_u:2236: ityuktvā sa devaputro bodhisattvaṃ divyaiḥ kusumairabhyarcya tatraivāntardadhe /
S04bsu022_u:2239: atha bodhisattva uragasāracandanamayaṃ lipiphalakamādāya divyārṣasuvarṇatirakaṃ samantānmaṇiratnapratyuptaṃ viśvāmitramācāryamevamāha - katamāṃ me bho upādhyāya lipiṃ śikṣāpayasi /
S04bsu022_u:2240_0: brāhmīkharoṣṭīpuṣkarasāriṃ aṅgalipiṃ vaṅgalipiṃ magadhalipiṃ maṅgalyalipiṃ aṅgulīyalipiṃ
S04bsu022_u:2240_1: śakārilipiṃ brahmavalilipiṃ pāruṣyalipiṃ drāviḍalipiṃ kirātalipiṃ dākṣiṇyalipiṃ ugralipiṃ
S04bsu022_u:2240_2: saṃkhyālipiṃ anulomalipiṃ avamūrdhalipiṃ daradalipiṃ khāṣyalipiṃ cīnalipiṃ lūnalipiṃ
S04bsu022_u:2240_3: hūṇalipiṃ madhyākṣaravistaralipiṃ puṣpalipiṃ devalipiṃ nāgalipiṃ yakṣalipiṃ gandharvalipiṃ
S04bsu022_u:2240_4: kinnaralipiṃ mahoragalipiṃ asuralipiṃ garuḍalipiṃ mṛgacakralipiṃ vāyasarutalipiṃ
S04bsu022_u:2240_6: utkṣepalipiṃ nikṣepalipiṃ vikṣepalipiṃ prakṣepalipiṃ sāgaralipiṃ vajralipiṃ lekhapratilekhalipiṃ
S04bsu022_u:2240_7: anudrutalipiṃ śāstrāvartāṃ gaṇanāvartalipiṃ utkṣepāvartalipiṃ nikṣepāvartalipiṃ pādalikhitalipiṃ
S04bsu022_u:2241: āsāṃ bho upādhyāya catuṣṣaṣṭīlipīnāṃ katamāṃ tvaṃ śiṣyāpayiṣyasi?
S04bsu022_u:2242: atha viśvāmitro dārakācāryo vismitaḥ prahasitavadano nihatamānamadadarpa imāṃ gāthāmabhāṣata -
S04bsu022_u:2245: Lal_10.7 yeṣāmahaṃ nāmadheyaṃ lipīnāṃ na prajānami /
S04bsu022_u:2247: Lal_10.8 vaktraṃ cāsya na paśyāmi mūrdhānaṃ tasya naiva ca /
S04bsu022_u:2253: iti hi bhikṣavo daśa dārakasahasrāṇi bodhisattvena sārdhaṃ lipiṃ śiṣyante sma /
S04bsu022_u:2254: tatra bodhisattvādhisthānena teṣāṃ dārakāṇāṃ mātṛkāṃ vācayatāṃ yadā akāraṃ parikīrtayanti sma,
S04bsu022_u:2301: iti hi bhikṣavasteṣāṃ dārakāṇāṃ mātṛkāṃ vācayatāṃ bodhisattvānubhāvenaiva pramukhānyasaṃkhyeyāni dharmamukhaśatasahasrāṇi niścaranti sma //
S04bsu022_u:2304: ayaṃ heturayaṃ pratyayo yacchikṣito 'pi bodhisattvo lipiśālāmupāgacchati sma //
S04bsu022_u:2311: athāpareṇa samayena kumārastadanyaiḥ kumārairamātyaputraiḥ sārdhaṃ kṛṣigrāmavalokayituṃ gacchati sma /
S04bsu022_u:2312: avalokya ca kṛṣikarmāntamanyata udyānabhūmiṃ praviśati sma /
S04bsu022_u:2313: saṃvignamanāstatra bodhisattva ekākī advitīyo 'nucaṃkramyamāṇo 'nuvicaran jambuvṛkṣamapaśyat prāsādikaṃ darśanīyam /
S04bsu022_u:2316: āsādya ca viviktaṃ kāmairviviktaṃ pāpakairakuśalairdharmaiḥ savitarkaṃ savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ prītisukhaṃ prathamaṃ dhyānamupasaṃpadya viharati sma /
S04bsu022_u:2317: sa vitarkavicārāṇāṃ vyupaśamādadhyātmasaṃprasādāccetasa ekotibhāvādavitarkamavicāraṃ samādhijaṃ prītisukhaṃ dvitīyaṃ dhyānamupasaṃpadya viharati sma /
S04bsu022_u:2318: sa prītervirāgādupekṣako viharati sma smṛtimān saṃprajānan /
S04bsu022_u:2320: yattadāryā ācakṣate upekṣakaḥ smṛtimān sukhavihārī niṣprītikaṃ tṛtīyaṃ dhyānamusaṃpadya viharati sma /
S04bsu022_u:2321: sa sukhasya ca prahāṇādduḥkhasya ca prahāṇāt pūrvameva ca saumanasyadaurmanasyayorastaṃgamādaduḥkhāsukhamupekṣāsmṛtipariśuddhaṃ caturthaṃ dhyānamupasaṃpadya viharati sma //
S04bsu022_u:2322: tena ca samayena pañca ṛṣayo bāhyāḥ pañcābhijñāḥ ṛddhimanto vihāyasaṃgamā dakṣiṇāyā diśa uttarāṃ diśaṃ gacchanti sma /
S04bsu022_u:2323: te tasya vanakhaṇḍasyopari gacchantaḥ pratyāhatā iva na śaknuvanti sma gantum /
S04bsu022_u:2325: Lal_11.1 vayamiha maṇivajrakūṭaṃ giriṃ merumabhyudgataṃ tiryagatyarthavaistārikaṃ gaja iva sahakāraśākhākulāṃ vṛkṣavṛndāṃ pradāritva nirdhāvitānekaśaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:2326: vayamiha marūṇāṃ pure cāpyasaktā gatā yakṣagandharvaveśmani cordhvaṃ nabhe niśritā ima puna vanakhaṇḍamāsādya sīdāma bhoḥ kasya lakṣmī nivarteti ṛddherbalam // iti //
S04bsu022_u:2327: Lal_11.2 atha yā tatra vanakhaṇḍadevatā sā tānṛṣīn gāthayādhyabhāṣat -
S04bsu022_u:2329: ayamiha vanamāśrito dhyānacintāparo devagandharvanāgendrayakṣārcito bhavaśataguṇakoṭisaṃvardhitastasya lakṣmī nivarteti ṛddherbalam // iti //
S04bsu022_u:2330: tataste 'dhastādavalokayanto 'drākṣuḥ kumāraṃ śriyā tejasā ca jājvalyamānam /
S04bsu022_u:2343: āho vajradharasya caiva pratimā candro 'tha sūryo hyayam /
S04bsu022_u:2344: kāmāgrādhipatiśca vā pratikṛtī rūdrasya kṛṣṇasya vā
S04bsu022_u:2345: śrīmān lakṣaṇacitritāṅgamanagho buddho 'tha vā syādayam // iti //
S04bsu022_u:2346: tataḥ sā vanadevatā tānṛṣīn gāthayā pratyabhāṣat -
S04bsu022_u:2347: yā śrī ca vaiśravaṇe ca vai nivasate yā vā sahasrekṣaṇe
S04bsu022_u:2349: brahme yā ca sahāpatau nivasate kṛṣṇe ca yā ca śriyā
S04bsu022_u:2350: sā śrī prāpya imaṃ hi śākyatanayaṃ nopaiti kāṃcitkalām //
S04bsu022_u:2351: atha khalu te ṛṣayastasyā devatāyā vacanamupaśritya dharaṇītale pratiṣṭhante /
S04bsu022_u:2352: te paśyanti sma bodhisattvaṃ dhyāyantamāniñjyamānena kāyena tejorāśimiva jvalantam /
S04bsu022_u:2355: Lal_11.5 loke kleśāgnisaṃtapte prādurbhūto hyayaṃ hradaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:2356: ayaṃ taṃ prāpsyate dharmaṃ yajjagad hlādayiṣyati //
S04bsu022_u:2370: atha khalu te ṛṣayo bodhisattvamābhirgāthābhirabhistutvā tripradakṣiṇīkṛtya vihāyasā prakrāntāḥ /
S04bsu022_u:2371: rājāpi śuddhodano bodhisattvamapaśyan bodhisattvena vinā na ramate sma /
S04bsu022_u:2375: tato 'nyatama amātyo bodhisattvaṃ paśyati sma jambucchāyāyāṃ paryaṅkaniṣaṇṇaṃ dhyāyantam /
S04bsu022_u:2376: sarvavṛkṣāṇāṃ ca tasmin samaye chāyā parivṛttābhūt /
S04bsu022_u:2377: jambucchāyā ca bodhisattvasya kāyaṃ na vijahāti sma /
S04bsu022_u:2378: sa taṃ dṛṣṭvā āścaryaprāptastuṣṭa udagra āttamanāḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajātaḥ śīghraṃ śīghraṃ tvaramāṇarūpo rājānaṃ śuddhodanamupasaṃkramya gāthābhyāmadhyabhāṣata -
S04bsu022_u:2379: Lal_11.10 paśya deva kumāro 'yaṃ jambucchāyāhi dhyāyati /
S04bsu022_u:2380: yathā śakro 'thavā brahmā śriyā tejena śobhate //
S04bsu022_u:2381: Lal_11.11 yasya vṛkṣasya chāyāyāṃ niṣaṇṇo varalakṣaṇaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:2382: sainaṃ na jahate chāyā dhyāyantaṃ purūṣottamam //
S04bsu022_u:2383: atha rājā śuddhodano yena sa jambuvṛkṣastenopasaṃkrāmat /
S04bsu022_u:2386: Lal_11.12 hutāśano vā girimūrdhni saṃsthitaḥ śaśīva nakṣatragaṇānucīrṇaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:2387: vepanti gātrāṇi mi paśyato imaṃ dhyāyantu tejo nu pradīpakalpam //
S04bsu022_u:2389: Lal_11.13 yadā cāsi mune jāto yadā dhyāyasi cārciman /
S04bsu022_u:2390: ekadvirapi te nātha pādau vande vināyaka //
S04bsu022_u:2391: tatra triphalavāhakā dārakāḥ śabdaṃ kurvanti sma /
S04bsu022_u:2392: tānamātyā evamāhuḥ - mā śabdaṃ mā śabdaṃ kārṣṭeti /
S04bsu022_u:2395: Lal_11.14 vyāvṛtte timiranudasya maṇḍale 'pi vyomābhaṃ śubhavaralakṣaṇāgradhārim /
S04bsu022_u:2396: dhyāyantaṃ girinicalaṃ narendraputraṃ siddhārthaṃ na jahati saiva vṛkṣachāyā //
S04bsu022_u:2398: Lal_11.15 grīṣme vasanta samudāgata jeṣṭhamāse saṃpuṣpite kusumapallavasaṃprakīrṇe /
S04bsu022_u:2400: Lal_11.16 [Vaidya_93]chando 'bhyuvāca parivāritu dārikebhiḥ hantā kumāra vani gacchama locanārtham /
S04bsu022_u:2401: kiṃ te gṛhe nivasato hi yathā dvijasya hanta vrajāma vaya codananārisaṃgham //
S04bsu022_u:2402: Lal_11.17 madhyāhnakālasamaye suviśuddhasattvaḥ pañcāśataiḥ parivṛtaiḥ saha ceṭakebhiḥ /
S04bsu022_u:2403: na ca mātu naiva ca pituḥ prativedayitvā so 'buddha niṣkrāmiti gacchi kṛṣāṇagrāmam //
S04bsu022_u:2405: dṛṣṭvā kumāra pratibuddha dukhena cotto dhiksaṃskṛteti bahuduḥkha kṛṣī karoti //
S04bsu022_u:2406: Lal_11.19 so jambuchāyamupagamya vinītacitto tṛṇakāni gṛhya svaya saṃstaru saṃstaritvā /
S04bsu022_u:2407: paryaṅkamābhujiya ujju karitva kāyaṃ catvāri dhyāna śubha dhyāyi sa bodhisattvaḥ //
S04bsu022_u:2408: Lal_11.20 pañcā ṛṣī khagapathena hi gacchamānā jambūya mūrdhni na prabhonti parākrametum /
S04bsu022_u:2409: te visthitā nihatamānamadāśca bhūtvā sarve samagrasahitā samudīkṣayanto //
S04bsu022_u:2410: Lal_11.21 vaya meruparvatavaraṃ tatha cakravālān nirbhidya gacchama javena asajjamānāḥ /
S04bsu022_u:2411: te jambuvṛkṣa na prabhoma atikrametuṃ ko nvatra heturayamadya bhaviṣyatīha //
S04bsu022_u:2412: Lal_11.22 avatīrya medinitale ca pratiṣṭhihitvā paśyanti śākyatanayaṃ tahi jambumūle /
S04bsu022_u:2413: jambunadārcisadṛśaṃ prabhatejaraśmiṃ paryaṅkabandhu tada dhyāyatu bodhisattvam //
S04bsu022_u:2414: Lal_11.23 [Vaidya_94]te vismitā daśanakhā kariyāna mūrdhni praṇatā kṛtāñjalipuṭā nipatan krameṣu /
S04bsu022_u:2415: sādho sujāta sumukhaṃ karuṇā jagasya śīghraṃ vibuddha amṛte vinayasva sattvān //
S04bsu022_u:2416: Lal_11.24 parivṛtta sūrya na jahī sugatasya chāyā olambate drumavaraṃ yatha padmapatram /
S04bsu022_u:2417: devā sahasra bahavaḥ sthita añjalībhiḥ vandanti tasya caraṇau kṛtaniścayasya //
S04bsu022_u:2418: Lal_11.25 śuddhodanaśca svagṛhe parimārgamāṇaḥ saṃpṛcchate kva nu gataḥ sa hi me kumāraḥ /
S04bsu022_u:2419: mātṛsvasā avaci mārgata no labhāmi saṃpṛcchatā narapate kva gataḥ kumāraḥ //
S04bsu022_u:2420: Lal_11.26 śuddhodanastvaritu pṛcchati kāñcukīyaṃ dauvārikaṃ tathapi cāntajanaṃ samantāt /
S04bsu022_u:2421: dṛṣṭaṃ kumāra mama kenaci niṣkramanto śṛṇute varūpagatu deva kṛṣāṇagrāmam //
S04bsu022_u:2422: Lal_11.27 so śīghrameva tvaritaṃ saha śākiyebhiḥ niṣkrāntu prekṣi kṛṣigrāmagiriṃ praviṣṭam /
S04bsu022_u:2423: yatha sūryakoṭiniyutāni samudgatāni tatha prekṣate hitakaraṃ śiriyā jvalantam //
S04bsu022_u:2424: Lal_11.28 mukuṭaṃ ca khaṅga tatha pāduka chorayitvā kṛtvā daśāṅguli śire abhivandite tam /
S04bsu022_u:2425: sādhū subhūtavacanā ṛṣayo mahātmā vyaktaṃ kumāra abhiniṣkrami bodhihetoḥ //
S04bsu022_u:2426: Lal_11.29 paripūrṇa dvādaśaśatā suprasannadevāḥ paccāśatā upagatā yatha śākiyānām /
S04bsu022_u:2427: dṛṣṭvā ca ṛddhi sugate guṇasāgarasya saṃbodhicittu janayaṃ dṛḍhaāśayena //
S04bsu022_u:2428: Lal_11.30 [Vaidya_95]so kampayitva trisahasra aśeṣabhūmiṃ smṛtu saṃprajānu pratibuddha tataḥ samādheḥ /
S04bsu022_u:2429: brahmasvaraḥ pitaramālapate dyutīmān utsṛjya tāta kṛṣigrāmabhato gaveṣa //
S04bsu022_u:2430: Lal_11.31 yadi svarṇakāryu ahu svarṇa pravarṣayiṣye yadi vastrakāryu ahameva pradāsyi vastrāṃ /
S04bsu022_u:2431: atha dhānyakāryu ahameva pravarṣayiṣye samyakprayukta bhava sarvajage narendra //
S04bsu022_u:2432: Lal_11.32 anuśāsayitva pitaraṃ janapāriṣadyāṃ tasmin kṣaṇe puravaraṃ puna so pravekṣī /
S04bsu022_u:2433: anuvartamāna jagataḥ sthihate puresmiṃ naiṣmkramyayuktamanasaḥ suviśuddhasattvaḥ // iti //
S04bsu022_u:2439: iti hi bhikṣavaḥ saṃvṛddhe kumāre rājā śuddhodano 'pareṇa samayena śākyagaṇena sārdhaṃ saṃsthāgāre niṣaṇṇo 'bhūt /
S04bsu022_u:2440: tatra te mahallakamahallakāḥ śākyā rājānaṃ śuddhodanamevamāhuḥ - yatkhalu devo jānīyāt /
S04bsu022_u:2441: ayaṃ sarvārthasiddhakumāro naimittikairbrāhmaṇaiḥ kṛtaniścayaiśca devairyadbhūyasaivaṃ nirdiṣṭo yadi kumāro 'bhiniṣkramiṣyati,
S04bsu022_u:2443: uta nābhiniṣkramiṣyati rājā bhaviṣyati cakravartī caturaṅgo vijitavān dhārmiko dharmarājaḥ saptaratnasamanvāgataḥ /
S04bsu022_u:2445: tadyathā - cakraratnaṃ hastiratnaṃ aśvaratnaṃ maṇiratnaṃ strīratnaṃ gṛhapatiratnaṃ pariṇāyakaratnam /
S04bsu022_u:2447: saṃpūrṇaṃ cāsya putrasahasraṃ bhaviṣyati śūrāṇāṃ varāṅgarūpiṇāṃ parasainyapramardakānām /
S04bsu022_u:2454: tato rājā śuddhodana evamāha - yadyevaṃ tena hi vyavalokayata kamatā kanyā kumārasyānurūpā syāt /
S04bsu022_u:2456: ekaika evamāha - mama duhitā anurūpā syāt kumārasya /
S04bsu022_u:2461: tataśca te sarve saṃnipatya kumārasyaināṃ prakṛtimārocayanti sma /
S04bsu022_u:2462: tān kumāra uvāca - saptame divase prativacanaṃ śroṣyatheti //
S04bsu022_u:2464: Lal_12.1 vidita mama ananta kāmadoṣāḥ saraṇasarvairasaśokaduḥkhamūlāḥ /
S04bsu022_u:2466: Lal_12.2 kāmaguṇi na me 'sti chandarāgo na ca ahu śobhami istrigāramadhye /
S04bsu022_u:2467: yannu ahu vane vaseya tūṣṇīṃ dhyānasamādhisukhena śāntacittaḥ // iti //
S04bsu022_u:2469: sa punarapi mīmāṃsopāyakauśalyamāmukhīkṛtya sattvaparipākamavekṣamāṇo mahākarūṇāṃ saṃjanayya tasyāṃ velāyāmimāṃ gāthāmabhāṣata -
S04bsu022_u:2470: Lal_12.3 saṃkīrṇi paṅki padumāni vivṛddhimanti ākīrṇa rāja naramadhyi labhāti pūjām /
S04bsu022_u:2471: yada bodhisattva parivārabalaṃ labhante tada sattvakoṭinayutānyamṛte vinenti //
S04bsu022_u:2472: Lal_12.4 ye cāpi pūrvaka abhūdvidu bodhisattvāḥ sarvebhi bhārya suta darśita istrigārāḥ /
S04bsu022_u:2473: na ca rāgarakta na ca dhyānasukhebhi bhraṣṭāḥ hantānuśikṣayi ahaṃ pi guṇeṣu teṣām //
S04bsu022_u:2474: Lal_12.5 na ca prākṛtā mama vadhū anukūla yā syād yasyā na iṣyatu guṇā sada satyavākyam /
S04bsu022_u:2475: yā cinti mahyamabhirādhayate 'pramattā rūpeṇa janmakulagotratayā suśuddhā //
S04bsu022_u:2476: Lal_12.6 so gāthalekha likhite guṇaarthayuktā yā kanya īdṛśa bhave mama tāṃ varethā /
S04bsu022_u:2477: na mamārthu prākṛtajanena asaṃvṛtena yasyā guṇā kathayamī mama tāṃ varethā //
S04bsu022_u:2478: Lal_12.7 yā rūpayauvanavarā na ca rūpamattā mātā svasā va yatha vartati maitracittā /
S04bsu022_u:2479: tyāge ratā śramaṇabrāhmaṇadānaśīlā tāṃ tādṛśāṃ mama vadhūṃ varayasva tāta //
S04bsu022_u:2480: Lal_12.8 yasyā na mānu na khilo na ca doṣamasti na ca śāṭhya īrṣya na ca māya na ujjubhraṣṭā /
S04bsu022_u:2481: svapnāntare 'pi purūṣe na pare 'bhiraktā tuṣṭā svakena patinā śayate 'pramattā //
S04bsu022_u:2482: Lal_12.9 na ca garvitā na pi ca uddhata na pragalbhā nirmāna mānavigatāpi ca ceṭibhūtā /
S04bsu022_u:2484: na ca pānagṛddha na raseṣu na śabdagandhe nirlobhabhidhyavigatā svadhanena tuṣṭā //
S04bsu022_u:2485: Lal_12.10 satye sthitā na pi ca cañcala naiva bhrāntā na ca uddhatonnatasthitā hirivastrachannā /
S04bsu022_u:2486: na ca dṛṣṭimaṅgalaratā sada dharmayuktā kāyena vāca manasā sada śuddhabhāvā //
S04bsu022_u:2487: Lal_12.11 na ca styānamiddhabahulā na ca mānamūḍhā mīmāṃsayukta sukṛtā sada dharmacārī /
S04bsu022_u:2488: śvaśrau ca tasya śvaśure yatha śāstṛpremā dāsī kalatra jani yādṛśamātmaprema //
S04bsu022_u:2489: Lal_12.12 śāstre vidhijña kuśalā gaṇikā yathaiva paścāt svapet prathamamutthihate ca śayyāta /
S04bsu022_u:2490: maitrānuvarti akuhāpi ca mātṛbhūtā etādṛśīṃ mi nṛpate vadhukāṃ vṛṇīṣva // iti //
S04bsu022_u:2491: atha khalu bhikṣavo rājā śuddhodana imā gāthā vācayitvā purohitamāmantrayate sma - gaccha tvaṃ mahābrāhmaṇa kapilavastumahānagare /
S04bsu022_u:2493: yasyā ete guṇāḥ saṃvidyante kṣatriyakanyāyā vā brāhmaṇakanyāyā vā vaiśyakanyāyā vā śūdrakanyāyā vā tāṃ kanyāmasmākaṃ prativedaya /
S04bsu022_u:2495: na hi kumāraḥ kulārthiko na gotrārthikaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:2498: Lal_12.13 brāhmaṇīṃ kṣatriyāṃ kanyāṃ veśyāṃ śūdrīṃ tathaiva ca /
S04bsu022_u:2499: yasyā ete guṇāḥ santi tāṃ me kanyāṃ pravedaya //
S04bsu022_u:2500: Lal_12.14 na kulena na gotreṇa kumāro mama vismitaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:2501: guṇe satye ca dharme ca tatrāsya ramate manaḥ // iti //
S04bsu022_u:2502: atha khalu bhikṣavaḥ sa purohitastaṃ gāthālekhaṃ gṛhītvā kapilavastuni mahānagare gṛhādgṛhaṃ vyavalokayan gatvā hiṇḍan kanyāṃ paryeṣate sma /
S04bsu022_u:2504: so 'nupūrveṇa vicaran yena daṇḍapāṇeḥ śākyasya niveśanaṃ tenopasaṃkrāmat /
S04bsu022_u:2505_0: sa taṃ niveśanaṃ praviṣṭo 'drākṣīt kanyāmabhirūpāṃ prāsādikāṃ darśanīyāṃ paramayā
S04bsu022_u:2505_1: śubhavarṇapuṣkaratayā samanvāgatāṃ nātidīrghāṃ nātihrasvāṃ nātisthūlāṃ nātikṛśāṃ
S04bsu022_u:2507: atha sā dārikā purohitasya caraṇau gṛhītvā evamāha - kena te mahābrāhmaṇa kāryam?
S04bsu022_u:2509: Lal_12.15 śuddhodanasya tanayaḥ paramābhirūpo dvātriṃśalakṣaṇadharo guṇatejayuktaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:2510: teneti gātha likhitā guṇaye vadhūnāṃ yasyā guṇāsti hi ime sa hi tasya patnī //
S04bsu022_u:2512: atha sā dārikā taṃ gāthālekhaṃ vācayitvā smitamupadarśya taṃ purohitaṃ gāthayādhyabhāṣat -
S04bsu022_u:2513: Lal_12.16 mahyeti brāhmaṇa guṇā anurūpa sarve so me patirbhavatu saumya surūparūpaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:2514: bhaṇahi kumāru yadi kārya ma hū vilamba mā hīnaprākṛtajanena bhaveya vāsaḥ // iti //
S04bsu022_u:2515: atha sa khalu purohito rājānaṃ śuddhodanamupasaṃkramyaiva tamarthamārocayati sma - dṛṣṭā mayā deva kanyā yā kumārasyānurūpā syāt /
S04bsu022_u:2518: atha rājñaḥ śuddhodanasyaitadabhavat - durāsadaḥ kumāraḥ śubhādhimuktaśca /
S04bsu022_u:2524: atha khalu rājā śuddhodano 'śokabhāṇḍāni kārayati sma suvarṇamayāni rūpyamayāni nānāratnamayāni /
S04bsu022_u:2525: kārayitvā ca kapilavastuni mahānagare ghaṇṭāghoṣaṇāṃ kārayāmāsa - saptame divase kumāro darśanaṃ dāsyati,
S04bsu022_u:2528: iti hi bhikṣavaḥ saptame divase bodhisattvaḥ saṃsthāgāramupasaṃkramya bhadrāsane nyaṣīdat /
S04bsu022_u:2529: rājāpi śuddhodano 'dṛśyapuruṣān sthāpayati sma - yasyāṃ dārikāyāṃ kumārasya cakṣuḥ saṃniviśet,
S04bsu022_u:2531: iti hi bhikṣavo yāvantyaḥ kapilavastuni mahānagare dārikāstāḥ sarvā yena saṃsthāgāro yena ca bodhisattvastenopasaṃkrāman bodhisattvasya darśanāya aśokabhāṇḍakāni ca pratigṛhītum //
S04bsu022_u:2533: iti hi bhikṣavo bodhisattvo yathāgatābhyastābhyo dārikābhyo 'śokabhāṇḍakānyanuprayacchati sma /
S04bsu022_u:2534: tāśca dārikā na śaknuvanti sma bodhisattvasya śriyaṃ tejaśca soḍhum /
S04bsu022_u:2535: tā aśokabhāṇḍakāni gṛhītvā śīghraṃ śīghrameva prakrāmanti sma //
S04bsu022_u:2536: atha daṇḍapāṇeḥ śākyasya duhitā gopā nāma śākyakanyā,
S04bsu022_u:2537: sā dāsīgaṇaparivṛtā puraskṛtā yena saṃsthāgāro yena ca bodhisattvastenopasaṃkrāmat /
S04bsu022_u:2540: tadā sā bodhisattvamupasaṃkramya prahasitavadanā bodhisattvamevamāha - kumāra kiṃ te mayāpanītaṃ yastvaṃ māṃ vimānayasi?
S04bsu022_u:2546: sā āha - na vayaṃ kumāraṃ vyalaṃkariṣyāmaḥ?
S04bsu022_u:2549: tatastairguhyapuruṣai rājānaṃ śuddhodanamupasaṃkramyaiṣa vṛttānto nivedito 'bhūt - deva daṇḍapāṇeḥ śākyasya duhitā gopā nāma śākyakanyā,
S04bsu022_u:2552: ityetatkhalu vacanaṃ śrutvā rājā śuddhodano daṇḍapāṇeḥ śākyasya purohitaṃ dautyena preṣayati sma - yā te duhitā,
S04bsu022_u:2555: asmākaṃ cāyaṃ kuladharmaḥ śilpajñasya kanyā dātavyā nāśilpajñasyeti /
S04bsu022_u:2559: tato rājña etadabhavat - dvirapīdamahaṃ sahadharmeṇa coditaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:2560: yadāpi mayoktaṃ kasmācchākyakumārāḥ kumārasyopasthānāya nāgacchantīti tadāpyahamabhihitaḥ - kiṃ vayaṃ maṇḍakasyopasthānaṃ kariṣyāma iti /
S04bsu022_u:2565: rājā āha - alaṃ te kumāra anena /
S04bsu022_u:2567: yāvattrirapi bodhisattvo rājānaṃ śuddhodanaṃ paripṛcchati sma //
S04bsu022_u:2569: tato rājā śuddhodano bodhisattvāya tāṃ prakṛtimārocayati sma /
S04bsu022_u:2570: tāṃ śrutvā bodhisattva āha - deva asti punariha nagare kaścidyo mayā sārdhaṃ samarthaḥ śilpena śilapamupadarśayitum?
S04bsu022_u:2571: tato rājā śuddhodanaḥ prahasitavadano bodhisattvamevamāha - śakyasi punastvaṃ putra śilpamupadarśayitum?
S04bsu022_u:2575: tato rājā śuddhodanaḥ kapilavastuni mahānagaravare ghaṇṭāghoṣaṇāṃ kārayati sma - saptame divase kumāraḥ svaṃ śilpamupadarśayati /
S04bsu022_u:2577: tatra saptame divase pañcamātrāṇi śākyakumāraśatāni saṃnipatitānyabhūvan /
S04bsu022_u:2578: daṇḍapāṇeśca śākyasya duhitā gopā nāma śākyakanyā jayapatākā sthāpitābhūt - yo vā atra asidhanuṣkalāpayuddhasālambheṣu jeṣyati,
S04bsu022_u:2580: tatra sarvapurato devadattaḥ kumāro nagarādabhiniṣkrāmati sma /
S04bsu022_u:2581: śvetaśca hastī mahāpramāṇo bodhisattvasyārthe nagaraṃ praveśyate sma /
S04bsu022_u:2582: tatra devadattaḥ kumāra īrṣyayā ca śākyabalamadena ca mattaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:2583: sa taṃ hastināgaṃ vāmena pāṇinā śuṇḍāyāṃ gṛhītvā dakṣiṇena pāṇinā capeṭayā ekaprahāreṇaiva hato 'bhūt //
S04bsu022_u:2586: dṛṣṭvā ca paryapṛcchat - kenāyaṃ hata iti /
S04bsu022_u:2589: sa taṃ hastināgaṃ lāṅgūle gṛhītvā nagaradvārādapakarṣati sma //
S04bsu022_u:2592: dṛṣṭvā ca paryapṛcchat - kenāyaṃ hata iti /
S04bsu022_u:2600_0: tataḥ kumāro rathasya evaikaṃ pādaṃ bhūmau prasārya pādāṅguṣṭhena taṃ hastināgaṃ
S04bsu022_u:2600_1: lāṅgūle gṛhitvā sapta prākārān sapta ca parikhānatikramya bahirnagarasya krośamātre prakṣipati sma /
S04bsu022_u:2601: yatra va pradeśe sa hastī patitastasmin pradeśe mahadbilaṃ saṃvṛttaṃ yatsāṃprataṃ hastigartetyabhidhīyate //
S04bsu022_u:2606: sapta purāparikhā atikramya kṣiptu bahiḥ svapurātu ayaṃ hi //
S04bsu022_u:2609: iti hi pañcamātrāṇi śākyakumāraśatāni nagarānniṣkamya yenānyatamaḥ pṛthivīpradeśo yatra śākyakumārāḥ śilpamupadarśayanti sma tenopasaṃkrāman /
S04bsu022_u:2610: rājāpi śuddhodano mahallakamahallakāśca śākyā mahāṃśca janakāyo yenāsau pṛthivīpradeśastenopasaṃkrāman bodhisattvasya cānyeṣāṃ ca śākyakumārāṇāṃ śilpaviśeṣaṃ draṣṭukāmāḥ //
S04bsu022_u:2611: tatra ādita eva ye śākyakumārā lipyāṃ paṭuvidhijñāste bodhisattvena sārdhaṃ lipiṃ viśeṣayanti sma /
S04bsu022_u:2612: tatra taiḥ śākyairviśvāmitra ācāryaḥ sākṣī sthāpito 'bhūt - sa tvaṃ vyavalokaya katamo 'tra kumāro lipijñāne viśiṣyate yadi vā lekhyato yadi vā bahulipiniryāṇataḥ /
S04bsu022_u:2613: atha viśvāmitra ācāryaḥ pratyakṣo bodhisattvasya lipijñāne smitamupadarśayannime gāthe 'bhāṣata -
S04bsu022_u:2615: yāvanti kecillipi sarvaloke tatraiṣa pāraṃgatu śuddhasattvaḥ //
S04bsu022_u:2616: Lal_12.20 nāmāpi yūyaṃ ca ahaṃ ca teṣāṃ lipīna jānāma na cākṣarāṇām /
S04bsu022_u:2617: yānyeṣa jānāti manuṣyacandro ahamatra pratyakṣu vijeṣyate 'yam //
S04bsu022_u:2620: tatrārjuno nāma śākyagaṇako mahāmātraḥ saṃkhyāgaṇanāsu pāraṃgataḥ,
S04bsu022_u:2621: sa sākṣī sthāpito 'bhūt - sa tvaṃ vyavalokaya katamo 'tra kumāro viśiṣyate saṃkhyājñānata iti /
S04bsu022_u:2625: bodhisattvasyaika dvau trayaścatvāraḥ pañcadaśa viṃśattriṃśaccatvāriṃśatpañcāśacchataṃ yāvatpañcāpi śākyakumāraśatāni yugapatkāle nikṣipanti sma,
S04bsu022_u:2631: dvāvapi trayo 'pi pañcāpi daśāpi viṃśatyapi triṃśadapi catvāriṃśadapi pañcāśadapi yāvatpañcāpi śākyakumāraśatāni yugapaduddiśanti sma /
S04bsu022_u:2632: na ca pariprāpayanti sma bodhisattvasya nikṣipataḥ //
S04bsu022_u:2641: Lal_12.21 jñānasya śīghratā sādhu buddhe saṃparipṛcchatā /
S04bsu022_u:2643: Lal_12.22 [Vaidya_103]īdṛśī ca iyaṃ prajñā buddhirjñānaṃ smṛtirmatiḥ /
S04bsu022_u:2646: ekakaṇṭhāścemāṃ vācamabhāṣanta - jayati jayati bhoḥ sarvārthasiddhaḥ kumāraḥ /
S04bsu022_u:2647: sarve cāsanebhya utthāya kṛtāñjalipuṭā bhūtvā bodhisattvaṃ namaskṛtya rājānaṃ śuddhodanametadavocan - lābhāste mahārāja paramasulabdhāḥ,
S04bsu022_u:2648: yasya te putra evaṃ śīghralaghujavacapalaparipṛcchāpratibhāna iti //
S04bsu022_u:2649: atha sa rājā śuddhodano bodhisattvamevamāha - śakyasi putra arjunena gaṇakamahāmātreṇa sārdhaṃ saṃkhyājñānakauśalyagaṇanāgatimanupraveṣṭum?
S04bsu022_u:2651: athārjuno gaṇakamahāmātro bodhisattvamevamāha - jānīṣe tvaṃ kumāra koṭiśatottarāṃ nāma gaṇanāgatim?
S04bsu022_u:2678: iti hi tallakṣaṇagaṇanayā sumerūparvatarājo lakṣanikṣepakriyayā parikṣayaṃ gacchet /
S04bsu022_u:2680: yasyāṃ gaṇanāyāṃ gaṅgānadīvālikāsamā lakṣanikṣepakriyayā parikṣayaṃ gaccheyuḥ /
S04bsu022_u:2687: yasyāṃ gaṇanāyāṃ daśa gaṅgānadīvālikāsamā lakṣanikṣepakriyayā parikṣayaṃ gaccheyuḥ /
S04bsu022_u:2689: yatra koṭīśataṃ gaṅgānadīvālikāsamā lakṣanikṣepāḥ parikṣayaṃ gaccheyuḥ /
S04bsu022_u:2691_0: yatra tathāgataṃ sthāpayitvā bodhimaṇḍavarāgragataṃ ca sarvaṃdharmābhiṣekābhimukhaṃ
