S04bsu022_u:3896: saṃnaddhagātro balavīryavikramaḥ kareṇa guhya jvalamānu vajram //
S04bsu022_u:3897: Lal_15.66 candraśca sūryo ubhi devaputrau pradakṣiṇaṃ vāmaku supratisthitau /
S04bsu022_u:3899: Lal_15.67 puṣyaśca nakṣatra sapāriṣadyo audārikaṃ nirmiṇi ātmabhāvam /
S04bsu022_u:3901: Lal_15.68 sarve 'dya siddhāḥ śubha tubhya maṅgalāḥ puṣyaśca yuktaḥ samayaśca gantum /
S04bsu022_u:3905: Lal_15.69 saṃcodakaścodayi devaputra uttiṣṭha śīghraṃ balavīryaudgataḥ /
S04bsu022_u:3907: Lal_15.70 samāgatā devasahasrakoṭyaḥ pravarṣamāṇā kusumān manojñān /
S04bsu022_u:3908: sa cāpi paryaṅkavare niṣaṇṇo devairvṛto bhrājati dīptatejaḥ //
S04bsu022_u:3909: nagare istrika dārakāśca puruṣā yāścābhavan dārikāḥ
S04bsu022_u:3912: sarve te śayitā kilāntamanasaḥ paśyanti rūpaṃ na te //
S04bsu022_u:3913: ye cā te dṛḍhavajratomaradharā śākyaiḥ sutāḥ sthāpitāḥ
S04bsu022_u:3915: rājā rājakumāra pārthivajanaḥ sarve prasuptā bhavan
S04bsu022_u:3916: api cā nārigaṇā vinagnavasanā suptā na te buddhiṣū //
S04bsu022_u:3918: rātrau nirgata ardharātrasamaye taṃ chandakaṃ abravīt /
S04bsu022_u:3919: sādhū chandaka dehi kaṇṭhaku mama svālaṃkṛtaṃ śobhanaṃ
S04bsu022_u:3920: mā vighnaṃ kuru me dadāhi capalaṃ yadi me priyaṃ manyase //
S04bsu022_u:3921: kva tvaṃ yāsyasi sattvasārathivarā kiṃ aśvakāryaṃ ca te
S04bsu022_u:3922: kālajñaḥ samayajña dharmacaraṇo kālo na gantu kvacit /
S04bsu022_u:3923: dvārāste pithitā dṛḍhārgalakṛtā ko dāsyate tāṃ tava /
S04bsu022_u:3924: śakreṇā manasātha cetanavaśātte dvāra muktā kṛtāḥ
S04bsu022_u:3925: dṛṣṭvā chandaka harṣito puna dukhī aśrūṇi so 'vartayī /
S04bsu022_u:3926: hā dhikko mi sahāyu kiṃ tu kurumī dhāvāmi kāṃ vā diśaṃ
S04bsu022_u:3927: ugraṃtejadhareṇa vākyu bhaṇitaṃ śakyaṃ na saṃdhāritum //
S04bsu022_u:3929: sā senā caturaṅginī balavatī kiṃ bhū karotīha hā
S04bsu022_u:3930: rājā rājakumāra pārthiva jano nemaṃ hi budhyanti te /
S04bsu022_u:3934: sādhu chandaka dehi kaṇṭhakavaraṃ mā khedayī nāyakam /
S04bsu022_u:3937: paśya chandaka antarīkṣa vimalaṃ divyā prabhā śobhate
S04bsu022_u:3939: śakraṃ paśya śacīpatiṃ balavṛtaṃ dvārasthitaṃ bhrājate
S04bsu022_u:3941: śrutvā chandaka devatāna vacanaṃ taṃ kaṇṭhakaṃ ālapī
S04bsu022_u:3943: so taṃ varṣikuvarṇa kāñcanakhuraṃ svālaṃkṛtaṃ kṛtvanā
S04bsu022_u:3945: eṣā te varalakṣaṇā hitakarā aśvaḥ sujātaḥ śubho
S04bsu022_u:3946: gaccha sidhyatu tubhya eva praṇidhiryaścintitaḥ pūrvaśaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:3947: ye te vighnakarā vrajantu praśamaṃ āsāṃ vrataṃ sidhyatāṃ
S04bsu022_u:3949: sarvā kampita ṣaḍvikāra dharaṇī śayanādyadā sotthitaḥ
S04bsu022_u:3952: śakro brahma ubhau ca tasya purato darśyanti mārgo hyayam //
S04bsu022_u:3953: ābhā tena pramukta acchavimalā obhāsitā medinī
S04bsu022_u:3954: sarve śānta apāya sattva sukhitā kleśairna bādhyī tadā /
S04bsu022_u:3956: sarve kṛtva pradakṣiṇaṃ puravaraṃ gacchanti harṣānvitāḥ //
S04bsu022_u:3957: Lal_15.82 [Vaidya_161]puravarottami devata dīnamanā upagamya gacchati mahāpuruṣe /
S04bsu022_u:3958: purataḥ sthitā karuṇadīnamanā girayā samālapati padmamukham //
S04bsu022_u:3959: Lal_15.83 tamasākulaṃ bhuvimu sarvapuraṃ nagaraṃ na śobhati tvaya rahitam /
S04bsu022_u:3960: na mamātra kāci rati prītikarī tyaktaṃ tvayā ca yadidaṃ bhavanam //
S04bsu022_u:3961: Lal_15.84 na punaḥ śruṇiṣyi rutu pakṣigaṇe antaḥpure madhuraveṇuravam /
S04bsu022_u:3962: maṅgalyaśabda tatha gītaravaṃ pratibodhanaṃ tava anantayaśaḥ //
S04bsu022_u:3963: Lal_15.85 darśe na bhūyu surasiddhagaṇāṃ kurvantu pūja tava rātridivam /
S04bsu022_u:3964: ghrāyiṣyi gandha na ca divya punaḥ tvayi nirgate nihatakleśagaṇe //
S04bsu022_u:3965: Lal_15.86 nirbhuktamālyamiva paryuṣitaṃ tyaktaṃ tvayādya bhavanaṃ hi tathā /
S04bsu022_u:3966: naṭaraṅgakalpa pratibhāyati me tvayi nirgate na bhuyu tejaśiri //
S04bsu022_u:3967: Lal_15.87 ojo balaṃ harasi sarvapure na ca śobhate aṭavitulyamidam /
S04bsu022_u:3968: vitathaṃ ṛṣīṇa vacanādya bhutaṃ yehī viyākṛtu bhuvi cakrabalo //
S04bsu022_u:3969: Lal_15.88 abalaṃ balaṃ bhuvimu śākyabalaṃ ucchinna vaṃśa iha rājakule /
S04bsu022_u:3970: āśā pranaṣṭa iha śākyagaṇe tvayi nirgate mahati puṇyadrume //
S04bsu022_u:3971: Lal_15.89 ahameva tubhya gati gacchayamī yatha tvaṃ prayāsi amalā vimalā /
S04bsu022_u:3973: api cā kṛpā karuṇa saṃjaniya vyavalokayasva bhavanaṃ tvamidam //
S04bsu022_u:3974: Lal_15.90 vyavalokya caiva bhavanaṃ matimān madhurasvaro giramudīritavān /
S04bsu022_u:3975: nāhaṃ pravekṣi kapilasya puraṃ aprāpya jātimaraṇāntakaram //
S04bsu022_u:3976: Lal_15.91 sthānāsanaṃ śayanacaṃkramaṇaṃ na kariṣyahaṃ kapilavastumukham /
S04bsu022_u:3977: yāvanna labdha varabodhi mayā ajarāmaraṃ padavaraṃ hyamṛtam //
S04bsu022_u:3978: Lal_15.92 yadasau jagatpradhāno niṣkrāntu bodhisattvo tasyā nabhe vrajanto stavayiṃsu apsarāṇām /
S04bsu022_u:3979: eṣa maha dakṣiṇīyo eṣa maha puṇyakṣetraṃ puṇyarthikāna kṣetraṃ amṛtāphalasya dātā //
S04bsu022_u:3980: Lal_15.93 ena bahukalpakoṭī dānadamasaṃyamenā samudānitāsya bodhiḥ sattvakaruṇāyamānā /
S04bsu022_u:3981: eṣa pariśuddhaśīlo suvrata akhaṇḍacārī na ca kāma naiva bhogāṃ prārthentu śīlarakṣī //
S04bsu022_u:3982: Lal_15.94 eṣa sada kṣāntivādī chidyanti aṅgamaṅge na ca krodhu naiva roṣaḥ sattvaparitrāyaṇārtham /
S04bsu022_u:3983: eṣa sada vīryavanto avikhinna kalpakoṭyaḥ samudānitāsya bodhiryaṣṭā ca yakṣakoṭīḥ //
S04bsu022_u:3984: Lal_15.95 eṣa sada dhyānadhyāyī śāntapraśāntacitto dhyāyitva sarvakleśāṃ moceṣyi sattvakoṭīḥ /
S04bsu022_u:3985: eṣo asaṅga prājñaḥ kalpairvikalpamukto kalpairvimuktacitto jinu bheṣyate svayaṃbhūḥ //
S04bsu022_u:3986: Lal_15.96 eṣa sada maitracitto karuṇāya pāraprāpto mudito upekṣadhyāyī brāhme pathi vidhijñaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:3988: Lal_15.97 [Vaidya_163]śaraṇaṃ bhayārditānāṃ dīpo acakṣuṣāṇāṃ layano upadrutānāṃ vaidyaścirāturāṇām /
S04bsu022_u:3989: rājeva dharmarājo indraḥ sahasranetro brahmasvayaṃbhubhūtaḥ kāyapraśabdhacitto //
S04bsu022_u:3990: Lal_15.98 dhīraḥ prabhūtaprajño vīro viviktacittaḥ śūraḥ kileśaghātī ajitaṃjayo jitāriḥ /
S04bsu022_u:3991: siṃho bhayaprahīṇo nāgaḥ sudāntacitto ṛṣabho gaṇapradhānaḥ kṣāntaḥ prahīṇakopaḥ //
S04bsu022_u:3997: Lal_15.100 ena jitu kleśamāro ena jitu skandhamāro ena jitu mṛtyumāro nihato 'sya deva(putra)māro /
S04bsu022_u:3998: eṣa maha sārthavāho kupathapratisthitānāṃ aṣṭāṅgamārgaśreṣṭhaṃ deśeṣyate nacireṇā //
S04bsu022_u:4000: bhuvi divi ca saṃpraghuṣṭo jinu bheṣyate svayaṃbhūḥ /
S04bsu022_u:4002: yatpuṇya tvāṃ stavitvā bhoma yatha vādisiṃhaḥ //
S04bsu022_u:4003: iti hi bhikṣavo 'bhiniṣkrānto bodhisattvo 'tikramya śākyānatikramya kroḍyānatikramya mallān maineyānāmanuvaineye niga me ṣaṭsu yojaneṣu /
S04bsu022_u:4005: tato bodhisattvo kaṇṭhakādavatīrya dharaṇītale sthitvā taṃ mahāntaṃ devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragasaṃghaṃ visarjayati sma /
S04bsu022_u:4006: visarjya cāsyaitadabhūt -imānyābharaṇāni kaṇṭhakaṃ ca chandakasya haste visarjayāmīti //
S04bsu022_u:4009: yatra ca pradeśe chandako nivṛttastatra caityaṃ sthāpitamabhūt /
S04bsu022_u:4012: punaśca bodhisattvasyaitadabhavat - kathaṃ ca nāma cūḍā ca pravrajyā ceti /
S04bsu022_u:4013: sa khaḍgena cūḍāṃ chittvā antarikṣe kṣipati sma /
S04bsu022_u:4014: sā ca trāyatriṃśatā devaiḥ parigṛhītābhūt pūjārtham /
S04bsu022_u:4015: adyāpi ca trāyatriṃśatsu deveṣu cūḍāmaho vartate /
S04bsu022_u:4018: punarapi bodhisattvasyaitadabhūt - kathaṃ hi nāma pravrajyā ca kāśikāni vastrāṇi /
S04bsu022_u:4022: tatraiko devaputro divyaṃ rūpamantardhāpya lubdhakarūpeṇa kāṣāyavastraprāvṛto bodhisattvasya purato 'sthāt /
S04bsu022_u:4023: atha bodhisattvastametadavocat - sacenme tvaṃ mārṣā kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇi dadyāḥ,
S04bsu022_u:4028: tatastena lubdhakarūpiṇā devaputreṇa bodhisattvāya kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇi dattānyabhūvan /
S04bsu022_u:4030: atha sa devaputro gauravajātastāni vastrāṇi ubhābhyāṃ pāṇibhyāṃ śirasi kṛtvā tata eva devalokamagamat teṣāṃ pūjārtham /
S04bsu022_u:4034: yadā ca bodhisattvena cūḍāṃ chittvā kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇi prāvṛtāni,
S04bsu022_u:4035: tasmin samaye devaputraśatasahasrā hṛṣṭāstuṣṭā udagrā āttamanasaḥ paramapramuditāḥ prītisaumanasyajātā hīhīkārakilikilāprakṣveḍitānirnādanirghoṣaśabdamakārṣuḥ /
S04bsu022_u:4039_1: pāramuttāryānuttare kṣeme 'bhaye 'śoke nirūpadrave śive virajase 'mṛte dharmadhātau
S04bsu022_u:4041: tato 'ntaḥpurikābhiḥ kumāramapaśyantībhiḥ grīṣmikavārṣikahaimantikeṣu prāsādeṣvāsaneṣu ca gṛheṣu parimāgamāṇā yadā na paśyanti sma,
S04bsu022_u:4043: tatra kāścitstriyaḥ paramaśokārtā hā tātehi krandanti sma /
S04bsu022_u:4062: kāścinmṛgya iva digdhaviddhāḥ sahasā pradhāvantyo [Vaidya_165] rudanti sma /
S04bsu022_u:4063: kāścinmārutakampitā iva kadalyaḥ pravikampyamānā rudanti sma /
S04bsu022_u:4065: kāścijjālotkṣiptamatsyā iva pṛthivyāṃ parivartyamānā rudanti sma /
S04bsu022_u:4066: kāścinmūlachinnā iva vṛkṣāḥ sahasā dharaṇītale nipatya rudanti sma //
S04bsu022_u:4067: taṃ ca śabdaṃ rājā śrutvā śākyānāmantrayate sma - kimetaduccairantaḥpure śabdaḥ śrūyate?
S04bsu022_u:4068: śākyā vijñāya kathayanti sma - kumāraḥ kila mahārāja antaḥpure na dṛśyate /
S04bsu022_u:4073: mahāprajāpatyapi gautamī paridevamānā mahītale parivartate sma /
S04bsu022_u:4074: rājānaṃ śuddhodanamevamāha kṣipraṃ māṃ mahārāja putreṇa samaṅginīṃ kuruṣveti //
S04bsu022_u:4079: te maṅgaladvāreṇa gacchantaḥ paśyanti sma antarāpathi puṣpavarṣaṃ prapatitam /
S04bsu022_u:4081: te svalpamantaraṃ gatvā taṃ devaputraṃ paśyanti sma bodhisattvasya kāśikavastrāṇi śirasi kṛtvā āgacchantam /
S04bsu022_u:4083: mā khalvanenaiṣāṃ vastrāṇāmarthe kumāro jīvitādvyaparopitaḥ syāt /
S04bsu022_u:4087: tataste parasparamūcuḥ - mā tāvadbhoḥ sāhasaṃ mā kārṣṭa /
S04bsu022_u:4090: te chandakaṃ paripṛcchanti sma - he chandaka,
S04bsu022_u:4091: mā khalvanenaiva puruṣeṇa kāśikānāṃ vastrāṇāmarthāya kumāro jīvitādvyaparopitaḥ syāt /
S04bsu022_u:4093: api tu anena kumārāya kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇi dattāni /
S04bsu022_u:4095: atha sa devaputrastāni vastrāṇyubhābhyāṃ pāṇibhyāṃ śirasi kṛtvā tata eva devalokamagamat teṣāṃ pūjārtham //
S04bsu022_u:4096: evaṃ ca te bhūyaśchandakaṃ paripṛcchanti sma - tatkiṃ manyase chandaka gacchāmo vayam?
S04bsu022_u:4100: evaṃ ca tenoktam - na tāvadahaṃ punarapi kapilavastumahānagaraṃ pravekṣyāmi,
S04bsu022_u:4105: tatastānyābharaṇāni cireṇa kālena bhadrikasya śākyakumārasya mahānāmno 'niruddhasya cābadhyanta sma /
S04bsu022_u:4106: tāni mahānārāyaṇasaṃghaṭanakāyārthamanye [Vaidya_166] nārāyaṇasaṃhananā na śaknuvanti sma dhārayitum /
S04bsu022_u:4107: yadā na kaścittāni dhārayituṃ śaknoti sma,
S04bsu022_u:4108: tadā mahāprajāpatyā gautamyā cintitamabhūt - yāvadahamimānyābharaṇāni paśyāmi,
S04bsu022_u:4111: tato mahāprajāpatī gautamī tānyābharaṇāni puṣkariṇyāṃ prakṣipati sma /
S04bsu022_u:4114: Lal_15.102 niṣkrāntu śūro yada vidu bodhisattvo nagaraṃ vibuddhaṃ kapilapuraṃ samagram /
S04bsu022_u:4115: manyanti sarve śayanagato kumāro anyonya hṛṣṭāḥ pramudita ālabhante //
S04bsu022_u:4116: Lal_15.103 gopā vibuddhā tatha api istrigārā śayanaṃ nirīkṣī na ca dṛśi bodhisattvam /
S04bsu022_u:4117: utkrośu mukto narapatino agāre hā vañcitāḥ smaḥ kahi gatu bodhisattvo //
S04bsu022_u:4118: Lal_15.104 rājā śruṇitvā dharaṇitale nirasto utkrośu kṛtvā aho mama ekaputro /
S04bsu022_u:4119: so stemito hi jalaghaṭasaṃprasikto āśvāsayantī bahuśata śākiyānām //
S04bsu022_u:4120: Lal_15.105 gopā śayāto dharaṇitale nipatya keśāṃ lunātī avaśiri bhūṣaṇāni /
S04bsu022_u:4121: aho subhāṣṭaṃ mama puri nāyakenā sarvapriyebhirnaciratu viprayogaḥ //
S04bsu022_u:4122: Lal_15.106 rūpā surūpā vimalavicitritāṅgā acchā viśuddhā jagati priyā manāpā /
S04bsu022_u:4123: dhanyā praśastā divi bhuvi pūjanīyā kva tvaṃ gato 'si mama śayi chorayitvā //
S04bsu022_u:4124: Lal_15.107 na pāsyi pānaṃ na ca madhu na pramādaṃ bhūmau śayiṣye jaṭamakuṭaṃ dhariṣye /
S04bsu022_u:4125: snānaṃ jahitvā vratatapa ācariṣye yāvanna drakṣye guṇadharu bodhisattvam //
S04bsu022_u:4126: Lal_15.108 [Vaidya_167]udyāna sarve aphala apatrapuṣpā hārā viśuddhā tamarajapāṃśutulyāḥ /
S04bsu022_u:4127: veśmaṃ na śobhī aṭavi puraṃ prakāśaṃ yattena tyaktaṃ naravarapuṃgavena //
S04bsu022_u:4128: Lal_15.109 hā gītavādyāḥ sumadhura mañjughoṣāḥ hā istrigārā vigalita bhūṣaṇābhiḥ /
S04bsu022_u:4129: hā hemajālaiḥ parisphuṭamantarikṣaṃ na bhūyu drakṣye guṇadharaviprahīṇā //
S04bsu022_u:4130: Lal_15.110 mātṛsvasā cā paramasukṛcchraprāptā āśvāsayāti ma rudahi śākyakanye /
S04bsu022_u:4131: pūrve ca uktaṃ naravarapuṃgavena kartāsmi loke jaramaraṇātpramokṣam //
S04bsu022_u:4132: Lal_15.111 so cā maharṣī kuśalasahasra cīrṇaḥ ṣaḍ yojanāni pratigatu rātriśeṣe /
S04bsu022_u:4133: chandasya detī hayavaru bhūṣaṇāni chandā gṛhītvā kapilapuraṃ prayāhi //
S04bsu022_u:4134: Lal_15.112 mātāpitaṇāṃ mama vacanena pṛcche gataḥ kumāro na ca puna śocayethā /
S04bsu022_u:4135: buddhitva bodhiṃ punarihamāgamiṣye dharmaṃ śruṇitvā bhaviṣyatha śāntacittāḥ //
S04bsu022_u:4136: Lal_15.113 chando rudanto pratibhaṇi nāyakasya na me 'sti śaktirbalata parākramo vā /
S04bsu022_u:4137: haneyu mahyaṃ naravarajñātisaṃghāḥ chandā kva nīto guṇadharu bodhisattvo //
S04bsu022_u:4138: Lal_15.114 mā tāhi chandā pratibhaṇi bodhisattvo tuṣṭā bhavitvā api mama jñātisaṃghāḥ /
S04bsu022_u:4139: śāstārasaṃjñā tvayi sada bhāviṣyanti premeṇa mahyaṃ tvayamapi vartiṣyante //
S04bsu022_u:4140: Lal_15.115 chando gṛhītvā hayavaru bhūṣaṇāni udyānaprāpto naravarapuṃgavasya /
S04bsu022_u:4142: udyānapālaḥ pramuditu vegajāto ānandaśabdaṃ pratibhaṇi śākiyānām //
S04bsu022_u:4143: Lal_15.116 ayaṃ kumāro hayavaru chandakaśca udyānaprāpto na ca puna śocitavyo /
S04bsu022_u:4144: rājā śraṇitvā parivṛtu śākiyebhiḥ udyānaprāpto pramuditu vegajāto //
S04bsu022_u:4145: Lal_15.117 gopā viditvā dṛḍhamati bodhisattvaṃ no cāpi harṣī na ca gira śraddadhāti /
S04bsu022_u:4146: asthānametadvinigatu yatkumāro aprāpya bodhiṃ punariha āgameyā //
S04bsu022_u:4147: Lal_15.118 dṛṣṭvā tu rājā hayavaru chandakaṃ ca utkrośu kṛtvā dharaṇitale nirasto /
S04bsu022_u:4148: hā mahya putrā sukuśalagītavādyā kva tvaṃ gato 'si vijahiya sarvarājyam //
S04bsu022_u:4149: Lal_15.119 sādhū bhaṇāhi vacana mameha chandā kiṃ vā prayogaḥ kva ca gatu bodhisattvaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:4150: kenātha nīto vivarita kena dvārā pūjā ca tasyā katha kṛta devasaṃghaiḥ //
S04bsu022_u:4151: Lal_15.120 chando bhaṇātī śṛṇu mama pārthivendrā rātrau prasupte nagari sabālavṛddhe /
S04bsu022_u:4152: so mañjughoṣo mama bhaṇi bodhisattvo chandā dadāhi mama laghu aśvarājam //
S04bsu022_u:4153: Lal_15.121 so bodhayāmi naragaṇi nārisaṃghaṃ suptā prasuptā na ca gira te śruṇanti /
S04bsu022_u:4154: so rodamāno dadi ahu aśvarājaṃ hanta vrajāhī hitakara yena kāmam //
S04bsu022_u:4155: Lal_15.122 śakreṇa dvārā vivarita yantrayuktāḥ pālāścatasro hayacaraṇe śiliṣṭāḥ /
S04bsu022_u:4156: ārūḍhi śūre pracalita trisahasrāḥ mārgo nabhe 'smin suvipula yena krānto //
S04bsu022_u:4157: Lal_15.123 [Vaidya_169]ābhā pramuktā vihatatamondhakārā puṣpā patiṃsū turiyaśatā raṇiṃṣū /
S04bsu022_u:4158: devāḥ staviṃsū tathapi hi cāpsarāṇi nabhasā prayāto parivṛtu devasaṃghaiḥ //
S04bsu022_u:4159: Lal_15.124 chando gṛhītvā hayavaru bhūṣaṇāni antaḥpure so upagatu rodamāno /
S04bsu022_u:4160: dṛṣṭvā tu gopā hayavaru chandakaṃ ca saṃmūrchayitvā dharaṇitale nirastā //
S04bsu022_u:4161: Lal_15.125 udyukta sarvā suvipula nārisaṃghāḥ vāriṃ gṛhītvā snapayiṣu śākyakanyām /
S04bsu022_u:4162: mā haiva kālaṃ kariṣyati śokaprāptā dvābhyāṃ priyābhyāṃ bahu bhavi viprayogo //
S04bsu022_u:4163: Lal_15.126 sthāmaṃ janitvā suduḥkhita śākyakanyā kaṇṭhe 'valambyā hayavaraaśvarāje /
S04bsu022_u:4164: anusmaritvā purimaka kāmakrīḍāṃ nānāpralāpī pralapati śokaprāptā //
S04bsu022_u:4165: Lal_15.127 hā mahya prītijananā hā mama narapuṃgavā vimalacandramukhā /
S04bsu022_u:4166: hā mama surūparūpā hā mama varalakṣaṇā vimalatejadharā //
S04bsu022_u:4167: Lal_15.128 hā mama aninditāṅgā sujāta anupūrvaudgatā asamā /
S04bsu022_u:4168: hā mama guṇāgradhāriṃ naramarūbhiḥ pūjitā paramakārūṇikā //
S04bsu022_u:4171: Lal_15.130 hā mama anantakīrte śatapuṇyasamudgatā vimalapuṇyadharā /
S04bsu022_u:4173: Lal_15.131 hā mama sujātajātā lumbinivana uttame bhramaragītarute /
S04bsu022_u:4174: hā mama vighuṣṭaśabdā divi bhuvi abhipūjitā vipulajñānadrumā //
S04bsu022_u:4175: Lal_15.132 hā mama rasārasāgrā bimboṣṭhā kamalalocanā kanakanibhā /
S04bsu022_u:4177: Lal_15.133 hā mama sunāsa subhrū ūrṇābhru mukhāntare sthitā vimalā /
S04bsu022_u:4180: iti tasya bhūṣaṇāni puṇyehi kṛtāni pārthive prītikarā //
S04bsu022_u:4181: Lal_15.135 ha mahya gītavādyā varapuṣpavilepanā śubhaṛtupravare /
S04bsu022_u:4183: Lal_15.136 hā kaṇṭhakā sujātā mama bhartu sahāyakastvayā kva nīto /
S04bsu022_u:4184: hā chandakā nikaruṇā na bodhayasi gacchamānake naravariṣṭhe //
S04bsu022_u:4185: Lal_15.137 gacchatyayaṃ hitakaro ekā gira tasminnantari na bhasi kasmāt /
S04bsu022_u:4186: itu adya puravarāto gacchati naradamyasārathiḥ kāruṇikaḥ //
S04bsu022_u:4187: Lal_15.138 katha vā gato hitakaro kena ca niṣkramito itu sa rājakulāt /
S04bsu022_u:4188: katamāṃ diśāmanugato dhanyā vanagulmadevatā yāsya sakhī //
S04bsu022_u:4189: Lal_15.139 atiduḥkha mahya chandā nidhidarśiya netrauddhṛtā cakṣudadā /
S04bsu022_u:4191: Lal_15.140 tānapi jahitva nirgatu kiṃ punarima istrikāmaratim /
S04bsu022_u:4194: prāgeva tena bhaṇitaṃ nāsti jarāmaraṇasaṃskṛte kāści sakhā //
S04bsu022_u:4195: Lal_15.142 paripūryato 'sya āśā spṛśatū varabodhisamuttamāṃ drumavariṣṭhe /
S04bsu022_u:4196: buddhitva bodhivirajāṃ punarapi etū ihā puravareṃ asmin //
S04bsu022_u:4197: Lal_15.143 chandakaḥ paramadīnamānaso gopikāya vacanaṃ śruṇitvanā /
S04bsu022_u:4198: sāśrukaṇṭha gira saṃprabhāṣate sādhu gopi niśṛṇohi me vacaḥ //
S04bsu022_u:4199: Lal_15.144 rātriye rahasi yāmi madhyame sarvanārigaṇi saṃprasuptake /
S04bsu022_u:4200: so tadā ca śatapuṇyaudgato ālapeti mama dehi kaṇṭhakam //
S04bsu022_u:4201: Lal_15.145 taṃ niśāmya vacanaṃ tadantaraṃ tubhya prekṣami śayāni suptikām /
S04bsu022_u:4202: uccaghoṣu ahu tatra muñcamī utthi gopi ayu yāti te priyo //
S04bsu022_u:4203: Lal_15.146 [Vaidya_171]devatā vacanu taṃ nirodhayi eka istri napi kāci budhyate /
S04bsu022_u:4205: Lal_15.147 kaṇṭhako hiṣati ugratejasvī krośamātru svaru tasya gacchatī /
S04bsu022_u:4206: no ca kaści śṛṇute purottame devatābhi osvāpanaṃ kṛtam //
S04bsu022_u:4207: Lal_15.148 svarṇarūpyamaṇikoṭitā mahī kaṇṭhakasya caraṇaiḥ parāhatā /
S04bsu022_u:4208: sā raṇī madhurabhīṣmaśobhanā no ca keci śṛṇuvanti mānuṣāḥ //
S04bsu022_u:4209: Lal_15.149 puṣyayuktu abhu tasmi antare candrajyotiṣa nabhe pratisthitā /
S04bsu022_u:4213: Lal_15.151 so ca puṇyaśatatejaudgato āruhī kumudavarṣikopamam /
S04bsu022_u:4214: ṣaḍvikāra dharaṇī prakampitā buddhakṣetra sphuṭa ābhanirmalā //
S04bsu022_u:4215: Lal_15.152 śakra devaguruḥ śacīpatiḥ svāma dvāra vivarī tadantare /
S04bsu022_u:4217: Lal_15.153 saṃjñamātra iha jāti kaṇṭhako lokanāthu vahatī nabho 'ntare /
S04bsu022_u:4219: devadānavagaṇā saindrikāḥ ye vahanti sugatasya gacchataḥ //
S04bsu022_u:4221: kaṇṭhakasya balu te dadantikāḥ muñci ghoṣu madhuraṃ manoramam //
S04bsu022_u:4222: Lal_15.155 kaṇṭhakā vahahi lokanāyakaṃ śīghra śīghra ma janehi khedatām /
S04bsu022_u:4224: Lal_15.156 ekameka abhinandate suro vāhanaṃ smi ahu lokanāyake /
S04bsu022_u:4225: no ca kiṃcidapi deśu vidyate devakoṭicaraṇairna marditam //
S04bsu022_u:4226: Lal_15.157 paśya kaṇṭhaka nabhontare imaṃ mārgu saṃsthitu vicitraśobhanam /
S04bsu022_u:4228: Lal_15.158 ena kaṇṭhaka śubhena karmaṇā trāyatriṃśabhavane sunirmito /
S04bsu022_u:4230: Lal_15.159 sādhu gopi ma khu bhūyu rodahī tuṣṭa bhohi paramapraharṣitā /
S04bsu022_u:4232: Lal_15.160 ye narāḥ sukṛtakarmakārakāḥ te na gopi sada roditavyakāḥ /
S04bsu022_u:4233: so ca puṇyaśatatejaudgato harṣitavya na sa roditavyakaḥ //
S04bsu022_u:4234: Lal_15.161 [Vaidya_173]saptarātra bhaṇabhānu gopike sā viyūha napi śakya kṣepitum /
S04bsu022_u:4235: yā viyūha abhu tatra pārthive niṣkramanti naradevapūjite //
S04bsu022_u:4236: Lal_15.162 lābha tubhya paramā acintiyā yaṃ tyupasthitu jage hitaṃkaro /
S04bsu022_u:4237: mahya saṃjñi svakameva vartate tvaṃ hi bheṣyasi yathā narottamaḥ // iti //
S04bsu022_u:4243: evaṃ khalu bhikṣavaśchandako bodhisattvādhisthānena rājñaḥ śuddhodanasya gopāyāḥ śākyakanyāyāśca sarvasya cāntaḥpurasya sarvasya ca śākyagaṇasya śokavinodakathāmakārṣīt //
S04bsu022_u:4244_0: iti hi bhikṣavo bodhisattvo lubdhakarūpāya devaputrāya kāśikāni vastrāṇi dattvā tasya
S04bsu022_u:4244_1: sakāśātkāṣāyāni vastrāṇi gṛhītvā svayameva pravajyāṃ lokānuvartanāmupādāya sattvānukampāyai
S04bsu022_u:4245: atha bodhisattvo yenaiva śākyā brāhmaṇyā āśramastenopasaṃkrāmat /
S04bsu022_u:4246: sā bodhisattvaṃ vāsena bhaktena copanimantrayate sma /
S04bsu022_u:4247: tato bodhisattvaḥ padmāyā brāhmaṇyā āśramaṃ gacchati sma /
S04bsu022_u:4252: iti hi bhikṣavo bodhisattvo 'nupūrveṇa vaiśālīṃ mahānagarīmanuprāpto 'bhut //
S04bsu022_u:4253: tena khalu punaḥ samayenārāḍaḥ kālāpo vaiśālīmupanisṛtya prativasati sma mahatā śrāvakasaṃghena sārdhaṃ tribhiḥ śiṣyaśataiḥ /
S04bsu022_u:4254: sa śiṣyebhya ākiṃcanyāyatanasahavratāyai dharmaṃ deśayati sma /
S04bsu022_u:4255: sa bodhisattvaṃ dūrata evāgacchantaṃ dṛṣṭvā āścaryaprāptaḥ śiṣyānāmantrayate sma - paśyata paśyata bho rūpamasyeti /
S04bsu022_u:4258: tato 'haṃ bhikṣavo yenārāḍaḥ kālāpastenopasaṃkramyārāḍa kālāpametadavocat - careyamahaṃ bho ārāḍe kālāpe brahmacaryam /
S04bsu022_u:4259: so 'vocat - cara bho gautama tathārūpeṇa dharmākhyāne yasmin śrāddhaḥ kulaputro 'lpakṛcchreṇājñāmārādhayati //
S04bsu022_u:4260: tasya me bhikṣava etadabhūt - asti me chando 'sti vīryamasti smṛtirasti samādhirasti prajñā,
S04bsu022_u:4261: yannvahameko 'pramatta ātāpī vyapakṛṣṭo vihareyaṃ tasyaiva dharmasya prāptaye sākṣātkriyāyai //
S04bsu022_u:4262: atha khalvahaṃ bhikṣavo eko 'pramatta ātāpī vyapakṛṣṭo viharannalpakṛcchreṇaivaṃ taṃ dharmamadhyavagacchan sākṣādakārṣam //
S04bsu022_u:4263: atha khalvahaṃ bhikṣavo yenārāḍaḥ kālāpastenopasaṃkramyaitadavocat - etāvadbho tvayā ārāḍa dharmo 'dhigataḥ sākṣātkṛtaḥ?
S04bsu022_u:4265: tamahamavocat - mayāpi bho eṣa dharmaḥ sākṣātkṛto 'dhigataḥ /
S04bsu022_u:4266: so 'vocat - tena hi bho gautama yadahaṃ dharma jānāmi,
S04bsu022_u:4271: iti hi bhikṣava ārāḍaḥ kālāpaḥ paramayā pūjayā māṃ pūjayati sma /
S04bsu022_u:4272: antevāsiṣu ca māṃ samānārthatayā sthāpayati sma //
S04bsu022_u:4274: tasya me bhikṣava etadabhūt - ayaṃ khalvārāḍasya dharmo na nairyāṇiko na niryāti,
S04bsu022_u:4277: atha khalvahaṃ bhikṣavo yathābhirāmaṃ vaiśālyāṃ vihṛtya magadheṣu ca prakrānto 'bhūt /
S04bsu022_u:4278: so 'haṃ magadheṣu caryāṃ caran yena māgadhakānāṃ rājagṛhaṃ nagaraṃ tadanusṛto yena ca pāṇḍavaḥ parvatarājastenopasaṃkrānto 'bhūvam /
S04bsu022_u:4280_0: tato 'haṃ kalyameva saṃnivāsya pātracīvaramādāya tapodadvāreṇa rājagṛhaṃ mahānagaraṃ
S04bsu022_u:4280_1: piṇḍāya prāvikṣat prāsādikenābhikrāntena pratikrāntena vyavalokitena saṃmiñjitena
S04bsu022_u:4281: tatra māṃ rājagṛhakā manuṣyā dṛṣṭvā vismitā abhūvan - kiṃ svidayaṃ brahmā bhaviṣyati śakro devānāmindra āhosvidvaiśravaṇo āhosvitkiṃcidgiridaivatam //
S04bsu022_u:4283: Lal_16.1 atha vimaladharo hyanantatejo svayamiha pravrajiyāna bodhisattvaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:4285: Lal_16.2 rajani vigatu jñātva bodhisattvaḥ paramasudarśaniyaṃ nivāsayitvā /
S04bsu022_u:4286: pātra pratigṛhīya nīcamāno praviśati rājagṛhaṃ sapiṇḍapātram //
S04bsu022_u:4287: Lal_16.3 kanakamiva sudhātujātarūpaṃ kavacitu lakṣaṇatriṃśatā dvibhiśca /
S04bsu022_u:4288: naragaṇa tatha nāri prekṣamāṇo na ca bhavate kvaci tṛpti darśanena //
S04bsu022_u:4289: Lal_16.4 vīthi racita ratnavastradhāryai avaśiriyā janu yāti pṛṣṭhato 'sya /
S04bsu022_u:4290: ko nu ayu adṛṣṭapūrvasattvo yasya prabhāya puraṃ vibhāti sarvam //
S04bsu022_u:4291: Lal_16.5 upari sthihiya nāriṇāṃ sahasrā tathariva dvāri tathaiva vātayāne /
S04bsu022_u:4293: rathya bharita gehi śūnya kṛtvā naravaru prekṣiṣu te ananyakarmāḥ //
S04bsu022_u:4294: Lal_16.6 na ca bhuyu krayavikrayaṃ karontī na ca puna sauṇḍa pibanti madyapānam /
S04bsu022_u:4295: na ca gṛhi na ca vīthiye ramante puruṣavarasya nirīkṣamāṇa rūpam //
S04bsu022_u:4296: Lal_16.7 puruṣa tvaritu gacchi rājagehaṃ avaciṣu rāja sa bimbisāra tuṣṭo /
S04bsu022_u:4297: deva parama tubhya labdha lābhā svayamiha brahma pure carāti piṇḍam //
S04bsu022_u:4298: Lal_16.8 keci avaci śakra devarājo apari bhaṇanti suyāma devaputraḥ /
S04bsu022_u:4299: tatha api saṃtuṣitaṃ va nirmitaśca apari bhaṇanti sunirmiteṣu devaḥ //
S04bsu022_u:4300: Lal_16.9 keci puna bhaṇanti candrasūryau tathapi ca rāhu baliśca vemacitrī /
S04bsu022_u:4301: keci puna bhaṇanti vācamevaṃ ayu so pāṇḍavaśailarājavāsī //
S04bsu022_u:4302: Lal_16.10 vacanamimu śruṇitva pārthivo 'sau paramaudagramanā sthito gavākṣe /
S04bsu022_u:4303: prekṣati varasattva bodhisattvaṃ jvalatu śirīya sudhātukāñcanaṃ vā //
S04bsu022_u:4304: Lal_16.11 piṇḍa dadiya rāja bimbisāraḥ puruṣamavocannirīkṣa kva prayātī /
S04bsu022_u:4305: dṛṣṭva girivaraṃ sa gacchamāno avaciṣu deva gataḥ sa śailapārśvam //
S04bsu022_u:4306: Lal_16.12 rajani vigatu jñātva bimbisāro mahata janaiḥ parivārito narendraḥ /
S04bsu022_u:4307: upagami pāṇḍavaśailarājamūle śiriya jvalantu tamadṛśāti śailam //
S04bsu022_u:4308: Lal_16.13 [Vaidya_177]dharaṇi vrajitu yāni oruhitvā paramasugaurava prekṣi bodhisattvam /
S04bsu022_u:4309: meruriva yathā hyakampamāno nyasiya tṛṇāni niṣaṇṇa sostikena //
S04bsu022_u:4310: Lal_16.14 śirasi caraṇi vandayitva rājā vividhakathāṃ samudāharitva vocat /
S04bsu022_u:4311: dadami tava upārdhu sarvarājyād rama iha kāmaguṇairahaṃ ca piṇḍam //
S04bsu022_u:4312: Lal_16.15 prabhaṇati giri bodhisattva ślakṣṇaṃ dharaṇipate ciramāyu pālayasva /
S04bsu022_u:4313: ahamapi pravijahya rājyamiṣṭaṃ pravrajito nirapekṣi śāntihetoḥ //
S04bsu022_u:4315: vipula dhana pratīccha nārisaṃghaṃ iha mama rājyi vasāhi bhuṅkṣva kāmāṃ //
S04bsu022_u:4316: Lal_16.17 paramapramudito 'smi daśanātte avaciṣu sa māgadharāja bodhisattvam /
S04bsu022_u:4317: bhavahi mama sahāyu sarvarājyaṃ ahu tava dāsyi prabhūta bhuṅkṣva kāmāṃ //
S04bsu022_u:4318: Lal_16.18 mā ca puna vane vasāhi śūnye ma bhuyu tṛṇeṣu vasāhi bhūmivāsam /
S04bsu022_u:4319: paramasukumāru tubhya kāyo iha mama rājyi vasāhi bhuṅkṣva kāmāṃ //
S04bsu022_u:4320: Lal_16.19 prabhaṇati giri bodhisattva ślakṣṇaṃ akuṭila premaṇiyā hitānukampī /
S04bsu022_u:4321: svasti dharaṇipāla te 'stu nityaṃ na ca ahu kāmaguṇebhirarthiko 'smi //
S04bsu022_u:4322: Lal_16.20 kāma viṣasamā anantadoṣā narakaprapātana pretatiryagyonau /
S04bsu022_u:4323: vidubhi vigarhita cāpyanārya kāmā jahita mayā yathā pakvakheṭapiṇḍam //
S04bsu022_u:4324: Lal_16.21 [Vaidya_178]kāma drumaphalā yathā patantī yathamiva abhrabalāhakā vrajanti /
S04bsu022_u:4325: adhruva capalagāmi mārutaṃ vā vikiraṇa sarvaśubhasya vañcanīyā //
S04bsu022_u:4326: Lal_16.22 kāma alabhamāna dahyayante tatha api labdha na tṛpti vindayantī /
S04bsu022_u:4327: yada puna avaśasya bhakṣayante tada mahaduḥkha janenti ghora kāmāḥ //
S04bsu022_u:4328: Lal_16.23 kāma dharaṇipāla ye ca divyā tatha api mānuṣa kāma ye praṇītā /
S04bsu022_u:4329: eku naru labheta sarvakāmāṃ na ca so tṛpti labheta bhūyu eṣan //
S04bsu022_u:4330: Lal_16.24 ye tu dharaṇipāla śāntadāntā ārya anāśrava dharmapūrṇasaṃjñā /
S04bsu022_u:4331: prajñaviduṣa tṛpta te sutṛptā na ca puna kāmaguṇeṣu kāci tṛptiḥ //
S04bsu022_u:4332: Lal_16.25 kāma dharaṇipāla sevamānā purima na vidyati koṭi saṃskṛtasya /
S04bsu022_u:4333: lavaṇajala yathā hi nārū pītvā bhuyu tṛṣa vardhati kāma sevamāne //
S04bsu022_u:4334: Lal_16.26 api ca dharaṇipāla paśya kāyaṃ adhruvamasāraku duḥkhayantrametat /
S04bsu022_u:4335: navabhi vraṇamukhaiḥ sadā sravantaṃ na mama narādhipa kāmachandarāgaḥ //
S04bsu022_u:4336: Lal_16.27 ahamapi vipulāṃ vijahya kāmāṃ tathapi ca istrisahasra darśanīyāṃ /
S04bsu022_u:4337: anabhiratu bhaveṣu nirgato 'haṃ paramaśivāṃ varabodhi prāptukāmaḥ //
S04bsu022_u:4339: Lal_16.28 katama diśi kuto gato 'si bhikṣo kva ca tava janma kva te pitā kva mātā /
S04bsu022_u:4341: kṣatriya atha brāhmaṇo 'tha rājā parikatha bhikṣu yadī na bhārasaṃjñā //
S04bsu022_u:4343: Lal_16.29 śratu ti dharaṇipāla śākiyānāṃ kapilapuraṃ paramaṃ suṛddhisphītam /
S04bsu022_u:4344: pitu mama śuddhodaneti nāmnā tanu ahu pravrajito guṇābhilāṣī //
S04bsu022_u:4346: Lal_16.30 sādhu tava sudṛṣṭadarśanaṃ te yanu tava janma vayaṃ pi tasya śiṣyāḥ /
S04bsu022_u:4347: api ca mama kṣamasva āśayenā yamapi nimantritu kāmavītarāgo //
S04bsu022_u:4348: Lal_16.31 yadi tvaya anuprāptu bhoti bodhiḥ tada mama seti bhoti dharmasvāmim /
S04bsu022_u:4349: api ca mama purā sulabdha lābhā mama vijite vasasīha yatsvayaṃbho //
S04bsu022_u:4350: Lal_16.32 punarapi caraṇāni vandayitvā kṛtva pradakṣiṇu gauraveṇa rājā /
S04bsu022_u:4352: Lal_16.33 magadhapuri praveśi lokanātho vihariya śāntamanā yathābhiprāyam /
S04bsu022_u:4353: arthu kariya devamānuṣāṇāṃ upagami tīru nirañjanā narendraḥ //
S04bsu022_u:4359: tena khalu punarbhikṣavaḥ samayena rudrako nāma rāmaputro rājagṛhaṃ nāma mahānagaramupanisṛtya viharati sma mahatā śiṣyagaṇena sārdhaṃ saptabhiḥ śiṣyaśataiḥ /
S04bsu022_u:4360: sa tebhyo naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanasahavratāyai dharmaṃ deśayati sma /
S04bsu022_u:4361: adrākṣīt khalvapi bhikṣavo bodhisattvo rudrakaṃ rāmaputraṃ saṃghegaṇinaṃ gaṇācāryaṃ jñātamabhīpsitaṃ bahujanapūjitaṃ paṇḍitasaṃmatam /
S04bsu022_u:4362: dṛṣṭvā cāsyaitadabhūt - ayaṃ khalvapi rudrako rāmaputraḥ saṃghegaṇī gaṇācāryaḥ jñāto 'bhīpsito bahujanapūjitaḥ paṇḍitasaṃmataḥ /
S04bsu022_u:4364: naiṣa mamāntike viśiṣṭasaṃjño bhavennāpi pratyakṣajñānena jñāto bhavennāpi saṃskṛtānāṃ sāśravānāṃ sopādānānāṃ dhyānasamādhisamāpattīnāṃ doṣo datto bhavet /
S04bsu022_u:4365: yannvahaṃ tathārupamupāyamupasaṃdarśayeyaṃ yenaite ca pratyakṣā bhaveyuḥ /
S04bsu022_u:4366: dhyānagocarāṇāṃ ca samāpattyārambaṇānāṃ laukikasamādhīnāmaniḥsaraṇatā darśitā bhavet /
S04bsu022_u:4367: yannvahaṃ rudrakasya rāmaputrasya sakāśamupasaṃkramya svasamādhiguṇaviśeṣodbhāvanārthaṃ śiṣyatvamabhyupagamya saṃskṛtasamādhīnāmasāratāmupadarśayeyamiti //
S04bsu022_u:4368: atha khalu bhikṣavo bodhisattva idamarthavaśamadhikṛtya yena rudrako rāmaputrastenopasaṃkrāmat /
S04bsu022_u:4369: upasaṃkramya rudrakaṃ rāmaputrametadavocat - kaste mārṣa śāstā,
S04bsu022_u:4371: ityevamukte rudrako rāmaputro bodhisattvamevamāha - na me mārṣa kaścicchāstā /
S04bsu022_u:4372: api tu khalu punaḥ svayameva mayedaṃ samyagadhigatamiti /
S04bsu022_u:4375: bodhisattva āha - labhemahi vayaṃ bhavataḥ sakāśādavavādānuśāsanīyasya samādhermārgam?
S04bsu022_u:4378: tato bodhisattva ekāntaṃ gatvā paryaṅkamābhujyopaviśati sma /
S04bsu022_u:4379_0: samanantaropaviṣṭasya ca bodhisattvasya puṇyaviśeṣeṇa ca jñānaviśeṣeṇa ca pūrvasucaritacaryāphalaviśeṣeṇa
S04bsu022_u:4379_1: ca sarvasamādhiparicayaviśeṣeṇa ca dhyānapramukhāni sarvāṇi laukikāni lokottarāṇi
S04bsu022_u:4379_2: samāpattiśatānyāmukhībhavanti sma sākārāṇi soddeśāni yathāpi taccittavaśavartitvāt /
S04bsu022_u:4380: atha ca bodhisattvaḥ smṛtaḥ saṃprajānan utthāyāsanādyena rudrako rāmaputrastenopasaṃkrāmat /
S04bsu022_u:4381: upasaṃkramya rudrakaṃ rāmaputramevamāha astyanyo 'pi mārṣa kaściduttare naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanasamāpattermārgaḥ?
S04bsu022_u:4383: tato bodhisattvasyaitadabhavat - na khalu rudrakasyaivāsti śraddhā vīryaṃ smṛtiḥ prajñā /
S04bsu022_u:4384: mamāpyasti śraddhā vīryaṃ smṛtiḥ samādhiḥ prajñā /
S04bsu022_u:4385: atha bodhisattvo rudrakaṃ rāmaputramevamāha - mayāpyeṣa mārṣa dharmo 'dhigato yatra tvaṃ niryātaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:4387: tvaṃ cāhaṃ cemaṃ gaṇaṃ pariharāva iti /
S04bsu022_u:4388: samānārthe ca bodhisattvaṃ [Vaidya_181] sthāpayati sma ācāryasthāne ca /
S04bsu022_u:4389: bodhisattva āha - naiṣa mārṣa mārgo nirvṛtaye na virāgāya na nirodhāya nopaśamāya nābhijñāyai na saṃbodhaye na śrāmaṇāya na brāhmaṇāya na nirvāṇāya saṃvartate //
S04bsu022_u:4390: iti hi bhikṣavo bodhisattvo rudrakasya rāmaputrasya saśiṣyasyāvarjanīkṛtva yāvadalamiti kṛtvā prakrāmat - alaṃ mamāneneti //
S04bsu022_u:4391: tena khalu punaḥ samayena pañcakā bhadravargīyā rudrake rāmaputre brahmacaryaṃ caranti sma /
S04bsu022_u:4392: teṣāmetadabhūt - yasya khalu vayamarthāya dīrgharātraṃ ghaṭāmahe udyujyāmahe,
S04bsu022_u:4393: na ca śaknumo 'ntaṃ vā paryantaṃ cādhigantum,
S04bsu022_u:4400: evaṃ vimṛṣya pañcakā bhadravargīyā rudrakarāmaputrasakāśādapakramya bodhisattvamanvabadhnan //
S04bsu022_u:4401: iti hi bhikṣavo bodhisattvo yathābhipretaṃ rājagṛhe vihṛtya magadheṣu cārikāṃ prakrāmat sārdhaṃ pañcakairbhadravargīyaiḥ //
S04bsu022_u:4402: tena khalu punaḥ samayenāntarācca rājagṛhasya antarācca gayāyā yo 'nyatamo gaṇa utsavaṃ karoti sma,
S04bsu022_u:4403: tena ca gaṇena bodhisattvo 'bhinimantrito 'bhūt vāsena bhaktena ca sārdhaṃ pañcakairbhadravargīyaiḥ //
S04bsu022_u:4404: atha khalu bhikṣavo bodhisattvo magadheṣu caryāṃ caran yena māgadhakānāṃ gayā tāmanusṛtya tāmanuprāpto 'bhūt /
S04bsu022_u:4405: tatra khalvapi bhikṣavo bodhisattvaḥ prahāṇārthī viharati sma gayāśīrṣe parvate /
S04bsu022_u:4406: tatrāsya viharatastisra upamāḥ pratibhānti sma aśrutapūrvā anabhijñātapūrvāḥ /
S04bsu022_u:4408: ye kecitte khalvapi śramaṇabrāhmaṇāḥ kāmebhyo 'navakṛṣṭakāyā viharanti sma /
S04bsu022_u:4410: yāpi caiṣāṃ kāmeṣu nandiḥ kāmeṣu rāgaḥ kāmeṣu chandaḥ kāmeṣu tṛṣṇā kāmeṣu pipāsā kāmeṣu mūrchā kāmeṣu paridāhaḥ kāmeṣvadhyavasānatā,
S04bsu022_u:4412: kiṃ cāpi te ātmopakramikāṃ śarīropatāpikāṃ duḥkhāṃ tīvrāṃ kharāṃ kaṭukāmamanāpāṃ vedanāṃ vedayante /
S04bsu022_u:4413: atha tarhi abhavyā eva te uttarimanuṣyadharmādalamāryajñānadarśanaviśeṣaṃ sākṣātkartum /
S04bsu022_u:4414: tadyathāpi nāma puruṣo 'gnyarthī jyotirgaveṣī jyotiṃ paryeṣamāṇaḥ sa ārdraṃ kāṣṭhamādāya ārdrāṃ cottarāraṇīmudake prakṣipya mathnīyāt,
S04bsu022_u:4416: evameva ya ime śramaṇabrāhmaṇāḥ kāmebhyo 'navakṛṣṭakāyā anavakṛṣṭacittāśca viharanti,
S04bsu022_u:4417: yāpyeṣāṃ kāmeṣu nandiḥ kāmeṣu rāgaḥ kāmeṣu chandaḥ kāmeṣu tṛṣṇā kāmeṣu pipāsā kāmeṣu mūrchā kāmeṣu paridāhaḥ kāmeṣvadhyavasānaṃ tadapyanupaśāntam /
S04bsu022_u:4418: kiṃ cāpi te ātmopakramikāṃ śarīropatāpikāṃ duḥkhāṃ tīvrāṃ kharāṃ kaṭukāṃ vedanāṃ vedayante /
S04bsu022_u:4420: iyaṃ bodhisattvasya prathamā upamā pratibhāti sma //
S04bsu022_u:4422: bhūyaścāsyaitadabhūt - ya ime śramaṇabrāhmaṇāḥ kāmebhyo vyapakṛṣṭakāyacittā viharanti,
S04bsu022_u:4423: yāpi teṣāṃ kāmeṣu nandīti sarvaṃ kartavyaṃ yāvajjyotiṃ paryeṣata iti /
S04bsu022_u:4424: sa ārdraṃ kāṣṭhamādāya sthale sthāpayitvā ārdrāṃ cottarāraṇiṃ mathnīyāt,
S04bsu022_u:4426: evameva ye ime śramaṇabrāhmaṇā iti sarvaṃ pūrvavatkāryaṃ yāvadabhavyā uttarimanuṣyadharmādalamāryajñānadarśanaviśeṣaṃ sākṣātkartum /
S04bsu022_u:4427: iyaṃ dvitīyā upamā pratibhāti sma pūrvamaśrutā cāvijñātā ca //
S04bsu022_u:4428: punaraparaṃ ya ime śramaṇabrāhmaṇā bhavantaḥ kāmebhyo vyapakṛṣṭakāyacittā viharanti,
S04bsu022_u:4432: kiṃ cāpi te ātmopakramikāṃ śarīropatāpikāṃ duḥkhāṃ tīvrāṃ kharāṃ kaṭukāṃ vedanāṃ vedayante /
S04bsu022_u:4433: atha khalu punarbhavyā eva te uttarimanuṣyadharmādalamāryajñānadarśanaviśeṣaṃ sākṣātkartum /
S04bsu022_u:4434: tadyathāpi nāma iha syātpuruṣo 'gnyarthī jyotirgaveṣī jyotiḥ paryeṣamāṇaḥ,
S04bsu022_u:4435: sa śuṣkaṃ kāṣṭhamādāya śuṣkāṃ cottarāraṇiṃ sthale pratiṣṭhāpya mathnīyāt,
S04bsu022_u:4437: evameva ya ime bhavantaḥ śramaṇabrāhmaṇā iti sarvaṃ yāvadvedanāṃ vedayanta iti /
S04bsu022_u:4438: atha ca punarbhavyā eva te uttarimanuṣyadharmādalamāryajñānadarśanaviśeṣaṃ sākṣātkartum /
S04bsu022_u:4439: iyaṃ tṛtīyā upamā pratibhāti sma aśrutapūrvā ca avijñātapūrvā ca //
S04bsu022_u:4440: atha khalu bhikṣavo bodhisattvasyaitadabhūt - ahaṃ khalvetarhi kāmebhyo vyapakṛṣṭakāyo viharāmi vyapakṛṣṭacittaśca /
S04bsu022_u:4441: yāpi me kāmeṣu nandīti sarvaṃ yāvattadapi me upaśāntam /
S04bsu022_u:4442: kiṃ cāpi ahamātmopakramikāṃ śarīropatāpikāṃ duḥkhāmiti peyālaṃ yāvadvedanāṃ vedmi /
S04bsu022_u:4444: iti hi bhikṣavo bodhisattvo yathābhipretaṃ gayāyāṃ vihṛtya gayāśīrṣe parvate jaṅgāvihāramanucaṃkramyamāṇo yenorubilvā senāpatigrāmakastadanusṛtastadanuprāpto 'bhūt /
S04bsu022_u:4445: tatrādrākṣīnnadīṃ nairañjanāmacchodakāṃ sūpatīrthāṃ prāsādikaiśca drumagulmairalaṃkṛtāṃ samantataśca gocaragrāmām /
S04bsu022_u:4446: tatra khalvapi bodhisattvasya mano 'tīva prasannamabhūt - samo batāyaṃ bhūmipradeśo ramaṇīyaḥ pratisaṃlayanānurūpaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:4450_0: iti hi bhikṣavo bodhisattvasyaitadabhūt - pañcakaṣāyakāle 'hamiha jambudvīpe 'vatīrṇo
S04bsu022_u:4468_0: iha ca kecitparatra manyante svargāpavargāvasmākametebhyo nirvartsyeta iti mithyāmārgaprayātā
S04bsu022_u:4468_2: tādṛśaṃ vratatapoviśeṣamālabheyaṃ yathā sarvaparapravādinaśca nigṛhītāḥ syuḥ,
S04bsu022_u:4470: dhyānagocarāṇāṃ ca rūpāvacarāṇāṃ ca devānāṃ dhyānaviśeṣopadarśanādāvarjanaṃ kuryāmiti //
S04bsu022_u:4471: iti hi bhikṣavo bodhisattva evaṃ cintayitvā ṣaḍvarṣikaṃ mahāghoraṃ vratatapaḥsuduṣkarātsuduṣkarāṃ duṣkaracaryāmālabhate sma /
S04bsu022_u:4475: na sa kaścitsattvaḥ sattvanikāye saṃvidyate manuṣyo vā amanuṣyo vā,
S04bsu022_u:4480: sa caturthadhyānamādita eva samāpadyamāna āśvāsapraśvāsānuparodhayati saṃnirodhayati /
S04bsu022_u:4481: akalpaṃ tad dhyānamavikalpamaniñjanamapanītamaspandanaṃ sarvatrānugataṃ ca sarvatra cāniśritam /
S04bsu022_u:4482: na ca tad dhyānaṃ jātu kenacitsamāpannaṃ pūrvaṃ śaiṣyeṇa vā aśaiṣyeṇa vā pratyekabuddhena [Vaidya_184] vā caryāpratipannena vā bodhisattvena /
S04bsu022_u:4484: ākāśamaspharaṇamakaraṇamavikaraṇaṃ tacca sarvaṃ spharatīti hyākāśasamaṃ tad dhyānam /
S04bsu022_u:4486_0: atha khalu bhikṣavo bodhisattvo lokasyāścaryasaṃdarśanārthaṃ tīrthikānāṃ ca darpanirghātanārthaṃ
S04bsu022_u:4486_1: parapravādināṃ ca nigrahārthaṃ devānāṃ cāvarjanārthamucchedaśāśvatavādināṃ ca sattvānāṃ
S04bsu022_u:4487: niṣadya ca svakāyaṃ cetasā nigṛhṇīte sma,
S04bsu022_u:4489: tato me bhikṣavo haimantikāsvaṣṭakarātriṣu tathā kāyaṃ nigṛhṇato niṣpīḍayataḥ kakṣābhyāmapi svedāḥ praśravanti sma /
S04bsu022_u:4491: bhūmau nipatanti sma avaśyāyanta ūṣmāyanto bāṣpāyantaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:4492: tadyathāpi nāma balavān puruṣo durbalataraṃ puruṣaṃ grīvāyāṃ gṛhītvā niṣpīḍayet,
S04bsu022_u:4493: evameva bhikṣava imaṃ kāyaṃ cetasā nigṛhṇato niṣpīḍayataḥ kakṣābhyāmapi svedāḥ praśravanti sma /
S04bsu022_u:4495: bhūbhau nipatanti sma avaśyāyanta ūṣmāyanto bāṣpāyantaḥ //
S04bsu022_u:4496: tasya me bhikṣava etadabhūt - yannvahamāsphānakaṃ dhyānaṃ dhyāyeyam /
S04bsu022_u:4497: tato me bhikṣava āsphānakaṃ dhyānaṃ dhyāyato mukhato nāsikātaścāśvāsapraśvāsā upaniruddhāvabhūtām /
S04bsu022_u:4499: tadyathāpi nāma karmāragagayā mathyamānāyāmuccaśabdo mahāśabdo niścarati,
S04bsu022_u:4500: evameva me bhikṣavo mukhanāsikābhyāmāśvāsapraśvāsāvuparuddhāvabhūtāṃ śrotachidrābhyāmuccaśabdo mahāśabdo niścarati sma //
S04bsu022_u:4501: tasya me bhikṣava etadabhūt - yannvahaṃ bhūya āsphānakaṃ dhyānaṃ dhyāyeyamiti /
S04bsu022_u:4504: tadyathāpi nāma bhikṣavaḥ puruṣaḥ kuṇḍayā śaktyā śiraḥkapālamupahanyād,
S04bsu022_u:4505: evameva me bhikṣavo mukhanāsikāśrotreṣūparuddheṣu āśvāsapraśvāsā urdhvaṃ śiraḥkapālamupanighnanti sma //
S04bsu022_u:4506: tāṃ cāvasthāṃ dṛṣṭvā bodhisattvasya tatra keciddevā evamāhu - kaṣṭaṃ bhoḥ kālagato batāyaṃ siddhārthaḥ kumāraḥ /
S04bsu022_u:4510: Lal_17.1 mā khalvayaṃ śākyanarendragarbho hyapūrṇasaṃkalpa ihaiva raṇye /
S04bsu022_u:4511: kṛtvā trilokaṃ dukhitaṃ hyanāthaṃ kālaṃ kariṣyatyakṛtārtha eva //
S04bsu022_u:4512: Lal_17.2 hā sattvasārā sadṛḍhapratijñā saddharmayajñena nimantritābhūt /
S04bsu022_u:4514: vayaṃ purā te tuṣiteṣu nāthā kva sā pratijñā tava śuddhasattva //
S04bsu022_u:4515: atha te devaputrāstrāyatriṃśeṣu deveṣu gatvā māyādevyā evamarthaṃ śrāvayanti - kālagataḥ kumāraḥ /
S04bsu022_u:4516: atha māyādevī apsarāgaṇaparivṛtā ardharātrasamaye nairañjanāyāstīre yena bodhisattvastenopasaṃkrāntā /
S04bsu022_u:4520: Lal_17.3 yadā jāto 'si me putra vane lumbinisāhvaye /
S04bsu022_u:4522: Lal_17.4 diśāṃ cālokya cature vācā te pravyāhṛtā śubhā /
S04bsu022_u:4523: iyaṃ me paścimā jātiḥ sā te na paripūritā //
S04bsu022_u:4525: kṣuṇṇaṃ vyākaraṇaṃ tasya na dṛṣṭā tena nityatā //
S04bsu022_u:4526: Lal_17.6 cakravartiśriyaṃ putra napi bhuktā manoramā /
S04bsu022_u:4527: na ca bodhimanuprāpto yāto 'si nidhanaṃ vane //
S04bsu022_u:4528: Lal_17.7 putrārthe kaṃ prapadyāmi kaṃ va krandāmi duḥkhitā /
S04bsu022_u:4531: Lal_17.8 kaiṣā ati tvāṃ karuṇaṃ rudāsi prakīrṇakeśā vinivṛttaśobhā /
S04bsu022_u:4534: Lal_17.9 mayā tu daśamāsāṃ vai kukṣau vajra ivā dhṛtaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:4535: sā te 'haṃ putrakā mātā vilapāmi suduḥkhitā //
S04bsu022_u:4536: atha bodhisattva āśvāsayannuvāca - na bhetavyaṃ putralālase,
S04bsu022_u:4541: Lal_17.10 api śatadhā vasudhā vikīryeta meruḥ plave cāmbhasi ratnaśṛṅgaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:4542: candrārkatārāgaṇa bhū pateta pṛthajano naiva ahaṃ mriyeyam /
S04bsu022_u:4544: yasmānna śoko tvayi atra kāryo na vai cirād drakṣyasi buddhabodhim //
S04bsu022_u:4545: sahaśravaṇādeva devī māyā saṃpraharṣitaromakūpajātā bodhisattvaṃ māndāravapuṣpairabhyavakirya tripradakṣiṇīkṛtvā divyatūryaiḥ saṃpravādyamānairyena svabhavanaṃ tenopajagāma //
S04bsu022_u:4546: tasya me bhikṣava etadabhūt - santyeke śramaṇabrāhmaṇā ye alpāhāratayā śuddhiṃ manyante /
S04bsu022_u:4549: syātkhalu punarbhikṣavo yuṣmākaṃ eṣā buddhiḥ - mahattaraṃ tatra kāle kolamāsīditi /
S04bsu022_u:4552: tasya me bhikṣava ekameva kolamāhāramāharato 'dvitīyaṃ kāyo 'tyarthaṃ karśito 'bhūddurbalaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:4553: tadyathāpi nāma bhikṣava āsītakīparvāṇi vā kālāparvāṇi vā,
S04bsu022_u:4557: tadyathāpi nāma vāhanakāraśālāyāṃ vā hastiśālāyāṃ vā jīrṇāyāmubhayato vivṛtāyāṃ gopānasyāntarikāśca virājante vyavabhāsante,
S04bsu022_u:4558: evameva me pārśukā antaḥkāye ubhayato virājante sma vyavabhāsante sma /
S04bsu022_u:4559: tadyathāpi nāma vartanyā veṇī unnatāvanatā bhavati samaviṣamā,
S04bsu022_u:4561: tadyathā tiktakālābustaruṇo lūna āmlāno bhavati saṃmlānaḥ samutpuṭakajātaḥ evameva śira āmlānamabhūtsaṃmlānaṃ samutpuṭakajātam /
S04bsu022_u:4562: tadyathāpi nāma grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse kūpatārakā dūragatā bhavanti,
S04bsu022_u:4564: evameva me 'kṣitārakau duragatāvabhūtāṃ kṛcchreṇa saṃprakāśyete sma /
S04bsu022_u:4567: tato yadāhaṃ bhikṣavaḥ pāṇinā kukṣiṃ spṛśāmīti pṛṣṭhikaṇṭakamevāsprākṣam /
S04bsu022_u:4569: tataḥ kṛcchreṇotthito 'pi pāṃśukṛtāni gātrāṇi pāṇinā pramṛjato me pūtiromāṇi kāyācchīryante sma /
S04bsu022_u:4570: yāpi me 'bhūtpaurāṇī śubhavarṇatanuḥ sāpyantaradhādyathāpīdaṃ rūkṣapradhānaṃ prahitātmanaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:4571: sāmantāśca me gocaragrāmavāsina evaṃ saṃjānante sma - kālako bata bhoḥ śramaṇo gautamaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:4576: tasya me bhikṣava etadabhūt - yannvahaṃ bhūyasyā mātrayālpāhāratayā pratipadyeyamiti /
S04bsu022_u:4578: syādbhikṣavo yuṣmākamevaṃ mahattaraṃ taṇḍulaṃ tasmin kāle 'bhūditi /
S04bsu022_u:4581: tasya me bhikṣava ekaṃ taṇḍulamāharataḥ kṣipraṃ kāyo 'bhūditi pūrvavadyāvanmadguracchavirbata bhoḥ śramaṇo gautama iti /
S04bsu022_u:4584: tasya me bhikṣava etadabhūt - yannvahaṃ bhūyasyā mātrayālpāhāratāyai pratipadyeyamiti /
S04bsu022_u:4588: tasya me bhikṣava etadabhūt - santyeke śramaṇabrāhmaṇā ye 'nāhāratayā śuddhiṃ manyante /
S04bsu022_u:4591: tasya me bhikṣavo 'nāhārasya kāyo 'tīva śuṣko 'bhūt kṛśo durbalaḥ,
S04bsu022_u:4592: tadyathāpi nāma āsitakīparvāṇi vā kālāparvāṇi vā /
S04bsu022_u:4599: kṛcchreṇāpi cotthitaḥ pāṃśukṛtāni me gātrāṇi pramṛjataḥ pūtimūlāni romāṇyaśīryanta /
S04bsu022_u:4603: sāmantāśca me gocaragrāmavāsino janā evaṃ saṃjānante sma - kālako bata bhoḥ śramaṇo gautamaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:4607: rājāpi tadā śuddhodanaḥ pratipratidivasaṃ bodhisattvasyāntike dūtaṃ preṣayati sma //
S04bsu022_u:4608_0: iti hi bhikṣavo bodhisattvo lokasyādbhutakriyāsaṃdarśanārthaṃ pūrvavadyāvatkarmakriyāpraṇaṣṭānāṃ
S04bsu022_u:4608_1: sattvānāṃ karmakriyāvatāraṇārthaṃ puṇyasaṃcayānāṃ codbhāvanārthaṃ mahājñānasya ca
S04bsu022_u:4609: adīnamānasaḥ ṣaḍvarṣā bodhisattvo yathā niṣaṇṇa evāsthāt paryaṅkena /
S04bsu022_u:4612: na ca vātātapavṛṣṭiparitrāṇamakaronna ca daṃśamaśakasarīsṛpānapanayati sma /
S04bsu022_u:4621: ye ca tatrāgaman grāmakumārakā vā grāmakumārikā vā gopālakā vā paśupālakā vā tṛṇahārikā vā kāṣṭhahārikā vā gomayahārikā vā,
S04bsu022_u:4626: yadasya karṇaśrotābhyāṃ tṛṇatūlakaṃ prakṣipya nāsāśrotābhyāṃ niṣkāsyate sma /
S04bsu022_u:4631: ye ca te devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragā manuṣyāmanuṣyā bodhisattvasya guṇeṣu pratyakṣāḥ,
S04bsu022_u:4632: te rātriṃdivaṃ samadhiṣṭhā bodhisattvasya pūjāṃ kurvanti sma /
S04bsu022_u:4634: tatra bodhisattvena tai ṣaḍbhirvarṣairduṣkaracaryāṃ saṃdarśayatā paripūrṇāni dvādaśanayutāni devamanuṣyāṇāṃ tribhiryānaiḥ paripācitānyabhūvan //
S04bsu022_u:4636: Lal_17.11 tasya ca guṇānvitasya purādviniṣkramya bodhisattvasya /
S04bsu022_u:4646: Lal_17.16 na ca yatra svānubhavatī na cāhitaṃ tena tiṣṭhavākyasya /
S04bsu022_u:4651: apare bhramanti nagnāḥ satyamidaṃ mohamanyaditi mūḍhāḥ //
S04bsu022_u:4652: Lal_17.19 dhārenti ūrdhvahastā urdhvaṃkeśā jaṭāśca dhārenti /
S04bsu022_u:4656: Lal_17.21 utsāṃ sarasataḍāgāṃ sāgarasaritaśca candrasūryau ca /
S04bsu022_u:4660: Lal_17.23 yannūnamahaṃ vratatapa duṣkaracaryāṃ samārabhe ghorām /

S04bsu022_u:4662: Lal_17.24 āsphānakaṃ ca dhyānaṃ dhyāyeyaṃ vajrakalpadṛḍhasthānam /

S04bsu022_u:4664: Lal_17.25 santīha devamanujāḥ tīrthika lūhavratena hṛṣyante /
S04bsu022_u:4668: Lal_17.27 āśvāsaviprahīnaḥ praśvāsavarjitu na ceñjate bālavān /
S04bsu022_u:4670: Lal_17.28 kalpaṃ no na vikalpaṃ na ceñjanaṃ nāpimanyena pracāram /
S04bsu022_u:4672: Lal_17.29 na ca ātapātu chāyāṃ chāyāyā nātapaṃ gataścāsau /
S04bsu022_u:4674: Lal_17.30 na ca vātavṛṣṭichadanaṃ na daṃśamaśakāsarīsṛpātrāṇam /
S04bsu022_u:4676: Lal_17.31 na ca kevalamātmārthaṃ dhyāyatyāsphānakaṃ dhyānam /
S04bsu022_u:4679: pāṃśupiśācakamiti taṃ manyante pāṃśunā ca mrakṣanti //
S04bsu022_u:4680: Lal_17.33 aśucīnā ca kirante vividhāste kāraṇāśca kārenti /
S04bsu022_u:4681: na ca iñjate bhramati vā dhyāyatyāsphānakaṃ dhyānam //
S04bsu022_u:4682: Lal_17.34 na ca namati no vinamate na kāyaparirakṣaṇā spṛśati /
S04bsu022_u:4683: kiṃcinnoccāraprasravaṃ śabdeṣu na saṃtrasī na paraprekṣī //
S04bsu022_u:4685: udarācca pṛṣṭhivaṃśo vidṛśyate vartitā yathā veṇī //
S04bsu022_u:4688: Lal_17.37 praṇidhiṃ ca kurvate te vayamapi tādṛśa bhavāmahe kṣipram /
S04bsu022_u:4690: Lal_17.38 na ca kevalamātmārthaṃ na dhyānasvādanānna sukhabuddhyā /
S04bsu022_u:4692: Lal_17.39 nihatāḥ parapravādā dhyāmīkṛta tīrthikā mativihīnāḥ /
S04bsu022_u:4693: karmakriyā ca darśita yā proktā kāśyape vācā //
S04bsu022_u:4694: Lal_17.40 krakucchandakasya bodhi bodhiriha sudurlabhā bahubhi kalpaiḥ /
S04bsu022_u:4703: māraśca bhikṣavaḥ pāpīyān bodhisattvasya ṣaḍvarṣāṇi duṣkaracaryāṃ carataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanubaddho 'bhūt avatāraprekṣī avatāragaveṣī /
S04bsu022_u:4713: Lal_18.4 jīvato jīvitaṃ śreyo jīvan dharmaṃ cariṣyasi /
S04bsu022_u:4714: jīvaṃ hi tāni kurute yāni kṛtvā na śocati //
S04bsu022_u:4715: Lal_18.5 kṛśo vivarṇo dīnastvaṃ antike maraṇaṃ tava /
S04bsu022_u:4717: Lal_18.6 dadataḥ satataṃ dānaṃ agnihotraṃ ca juhvataḥ /
S04bsu022_u:4719: Lal_18.7 duḥkhaṃ mārgaṃ prahāṇasya duṣkaraṃ cittanigraham /
S04bsu022_u:4723: Lal_18.9 aṇumātraṃ hi me puṇyairartho māra na vidyate /
S04bsu022_u:4724: artho yeṣāṃ tu puṇyena tānevaṃ vaktumarhasi //
S04bsu022_u:4725: Lal_18.10 naivāhaṃ maraṇaṃ manye maraṇāntaṃ hi jīvitam /
S04bsu022_u:4727: Lal_18.11 srotāṃsyapi nadīnāṃ hi vāyureṣa viśoṣayet /
S04bsu022_u:4730: Lal_18.12 śoṇite tu viśuṣke vai tato māṃsaṃ viśuṣyati /
S04bsu022_u:4734: cittaṃ nāvekṣate kāyaṃ paśya sattvasya śuddhatām //
S04bsu022_u:4735: Lal_18.14 asti chandaṃ tathā vīryaṃ prajñāpi mama vidyate /
S04bsu022_u:4736: taṃ na paśyāmyahaṃ loke vīryādyo māṃ vicālayet //
S04bsu022_u:4737: Lal_18.15 varaṃ mṛtyuḥ prāṇaharo dhiggrāmyaṃ nopajīvitam /
S04bsu022_u:4739: Lal_18.16 nāśūro jayate senāṃ jitvā caināṃ na manyate /
S04bsu022_u:4740: śūrastu jayate senāṃ laghu māra jayāmi te //
S04bsu022_u:4741: Lal_18.17 kāmāste prathamā senā dvitīyā aratistathā /
S04bsu022_u:4742: tṛtīyā kṣutpipāsā te tṛṣṇā senā caturthikā //
S04bsu022_u:4743: Lal_18.18 pañcamī styānamiddhaṃ te bhayaṃ ṣaṣṭī nirucyate /
S04bsu022_u:4745: Lal_18.19 lobhaślokau ca saṃskārau mithyālabdhaṃ ca yadyaśaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:4747: Lal_18.20 eṣā hi namuceḥ senā kṛṣṇabandhoḥ pratāpinaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:4749: Lal_18.21 yā te senā dharṣayati lokamenaṃ sadevakam /
S04bsu022_u:4751: Lal_18.22 smṛtiṃ sūpasthitāṃ kṛtvā prajñāṃ caiva subhāvitām /
S04bsu022_u:4753: evamukte māraḥ pāpīyān duḥkhī durmanā anāttamanā vipratisārī tatraivāntaradhāt //
S04bsu022_u:4754_0: atha khalu bhikṣavo bodhisattvasyaitadabhūt - ye kecicchramaṇā brāhmaṇā vā atītānāgatapratyutpanneṣvadhvasvātmopakramikāṃ
S04bsu022_u:4754_1: śarīropatāpikāṃ duḥkhāṃ tīvrāṃ kharāṃ kaṭukāmamanāpāṃ vedanāṃ vedayanti etāvatparamaṃ
S04bsu022_u:4756: tasya me bhikṣava etadabhūt - anayāpi khalu mayā caryayā anayāpi pratipadā na kaściduttarimanuṣyadharmādalamāryajñānadarśanaviśeṣaḥ sākṣātkṛtaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:4760_0: tasya me bhikṣava etadabhavat - yadahaṃ piturudyāne jambucchāyāyāṃ niṣaṇṇo viviktaṃ
S04bsu022_u:4760_1: kāmairviviktaṃ pāpakairakuśalairdharmaiḥ savitarkaṃ savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ prītisukhaṃ
S04bsu022_u:4764: tasya mamaitadabhūt - nāsau mārgaḥ śakyaḥ evaṃ daurbalyaprāptenābhisaṃboddhum /
S04bsu022_u:4766: na me paścimā janatā anukampitā syāt /
S04bsu022_u:4769: tatra bhikṣavo ye te lūhādhimuktā devaputrāste mama cetasaścetasaiva parivitarkamājñāya yenāhaṃ tenopasaṃkramya māmevamāhuḥ - mā sma tvaṃ satpuruṣa audārikamāhāramāhareḥ /
S04bsu022_u:4771: tasya me bhikṣava etadabhūt - ahaṃ khalvanaśana ityātmānaṃ pratijāne,
S04bsu022_u:4772: sāmantāśca me gocaragrāmavāsino janā evaṃ saṃjānante sma yathānaśanaḥ śramaṇo gautamaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:4773: itīva me khalu lūhādhimuktā devaputrā romakūpairojaḥ prakṣipanti /
S04bsu022_u:4775: tato bodhisattvo mṛṣāvādaparihārārthaṃ tān devaputrān pratikṣipyaudārikamāhāramāhartu cittaṃ nāmayati sma //
S04bsu022_u:4776: iti hi bhikṣavaḥ ṣaḍvarṣavratatapaḥsamuttīrṇo bodhisattvo 'smādāsanādutthāyaudārikamāhāramāhariṣyāmīti vācaṃ niścārayati sma /
S04bsu022_u:4778_0: atha khalu bhikṣavaḥ pañcānāṃ bhadravargīyānāmetadabhūt - tayāpi tāvaccaryayā tayāpi
S04bsu022_u:4778_1: tāvatpratipadā śramaṇena gautamena na śakitaṃ kiṃciduttarimanuṣyadharmādalamāryajñānadarśanaviśeṣaṃ sākṣātkartum,
S04bsu022_u:4781: te vārāṇasīṃ gatvā ṛṣipatane mṛgadāve vyāhārṣuḥ //
S04bsu022_u:4782: tatra bodhisattvamādita eva duṣkaracaryāṃ carantaṃ daśa grāmikaduhitaraḥ kumārya upagacchan darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya ca /
S04bsu022_u:4785: balā ca nāma dārikā balaguptā ca supriyā ca vijayasenā ca atimuktakamalā ca sundarī ca kumbhakārī ca uluvillikā ca jaṭilikā ca sujātā ca nāma grāmikaduhitāḥ /
S04bsu022_u:4786: ābhiḥ kumārikābhirbodhisattvāya sarvāstā yūṣavidhāḥ kṛtvopanāmitā abhūvan /
S04bsu022_u:4787: tāścābhyavahṛtya bodhisattvaḥ krameṇa gocaragrāme piṇḍāya caran varṇarūpabalavānabhūt /
S04bsu022_u:4788: tadagreṇa bodhisattvaḥ sundaraḥ śramaṇo mahāśramaṇa ityācakṣate //
S04bsu022_u:4789_0: tatra ca bhikṣavaḥ sujātā grāmikaduhitā bodhisattvasya duṣkaracaryāṃ carataḥ ādita
S04bsu022_u:4790: evaṃ ca praṇidadhāti sma - mama bhojanaṃ bhuktvā bodhisattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyeteti //
S04bsu022_u:4791: tasya me bhikṣavaḥ ṣaḍvarṣavyativṛttasya kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇi parijīrṇānyabhūvan /
S04bsu022_u:4792: tasya me bhikṣava etadabhūt - sacedahaṃ kaupīnapracchādanaṃ labheyam,
S04bsu022_u:4794: tena khalu punarbhikṣavaḥ samayena sujātāyā grāmikaduhiturdāsī rādhā nāma kālagatābhūt /
S04bsu022_u:4797: tato 'haṃ tatpāṃśukūlaṃ vāmena pādenākramya dakṣiṇaṃ hastaṃ prasāryāvanato 'bhūttadrahītum /
S04bsu022_u:4798: atha bhaumā devā antarīkṣāṇāṃ devānāṃ ghoṣamanuśrāvayanti sma - āścaryaṃ mārṣā adbhutamidaṃ mārṣāḥ /
S04bsu022_u:4799: yatra hi nāmaivaṃ mahārājakulaprasūtasya cakravartirājyaparityāginaḥ pāṃśukūle cittaṃ natamiti /
S04bsu022_u:4800: antarīkṣā devā bhaumānāṃ devānāṃ śabdaṃ śratvā cāturmahārājikānāṃ devānāṃ ghoṣamudīrayanti sma /
S04bsu022_u:4807: iti hi bhikṣavastatkṣaṇaṃ tallavaṃ tanmuhūrtaṃ yāvadakaniṣṭhabhuvanādekaghoṣa ekasaṃnirnādo 'bhyudgato 'bhūt āścaryamidaṃ mārṣā adbhutamidam /
S04bsu022_u:4808: yatra hi nāmaivaṃ mahārājakulaprasūtasya cakravartirājyaparityāginaḥ pāṃśukūle cittaṃ natamiti //
S04bsu022_u:4809: atha bodhisattvasya punarapyetadabhavat - labdhaṃ mayā pāṃśukūlam /
S04bsu022_u:4812: tatastatraiva devatā pāṇinā mahīṃ parāhanti sma /
S04bsu022_u:4821: atha śakro devarājo bodhisattvamevamāha - dadasvedaṃ satpuruṣa mahyam /
S04bsu022_u:4823: tato bodhisattvaḥ svayaṃkāritāṃ pravrajyāyāḥ saṃdarśayituṃ tatpāṃśukūlaṃ śakrasyādatvā svayameva prakṣālayati sma /
S04bsu022_u:4825: māreṇa ca pāpīyasā [Vaidya_195] īrṣyādharmaparītena puṣkariṇyā atyucchritāni taṭāni nirmitānyabhūvan /
S04bsu022_u:4827: tatra devatāṃ bodhisattvo lokānuvṛttyā devatānugrahārthaṃ cābravīt - āhara devate vṛkṣaśākhāmiti /
S04bsu022_u:4830: uttīrya ca tasya kakubhapādapasyādhastāttatpāṃśukūlaṃ saṃghāṭīkṛtya āsīvyati sma /
S04bsu022_u:4831: adyāpi tat pāṃśukūlaṃ sīvanamityevaṃ saṃjñāyate sma //
S04bsu022_u:4833: sa divyāni cīvarāṇi kāṣāyaraṅgaraktāni kalpikāni śramaṇasārūpyāṇi bodhisattvāyopanāmayati sma /
S04bsu022_u:4834: bodhisattvaśca tāni gṛhītvā pūrvāhṇe nivāsya saṃghāṭīprāvṛtya gocaragrāmābhimukho 'bhut //
S04bsu022_u:4835: tatra devatābhirurubilvāsenāpatigrāmake nandikagrāmikaduhituḥ sujātāyā ārocitamabhūdardharātrasamaye - yadarthaṃ tvaṃ mahāyajñaṃ yajase tasmādvratāduttīrṇaḥ saḥ /
S04bsu022_u:4837: tvayā ca pūrve praṇidhānaṃ kṛtam - mama bhojanaṃ bhuktvā bodhisattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyeta iti /
S04bsu022_u:4839: atha khalu bhikṣavaḥ sujātā nandikagrāmaduhitā teṣāṃ devatānāṃ tadvacanaṃ śrutvā śīghraṃ gosahasrasya kṣīrātsaptakṛtsāroddhṛtādagryamojomaṇḍaṃ gṛhṇīte sma /
S04bsu022_u:4841: bhinavaistaṇḍulairabhinavāyāṃ sthālyāmabhinavāṃ cullīmupalipya tadbhojanaṃ sādhayati sma /
S04bsu022_u:4842: tasmiṃśca sādhyamāne imāni pūrvanimittāni saṃdṛśyante sma - tasmin khalvapi kṣīre śrīvatsasvastikanandyāvartapadmavardhamānādīni maṅgalyāni saṃdṛśyante sma /
S04bsu022_u:4844: niḥsaṃśayamidaṃ bhojanaṃ bhuktvā bodhisattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ prāpsyati /
S04bsu022_u:4847: tataḥ sujātā taṃ pāyasaṃ pakvaṃ sthaṇḍilamupalipya puṣpairavakīrya gandhodakenābhyukṣya āsanaṃ prajñāpya satkṛtyottarāṃ nāma ceṭīmāmantrayate sma - gacchottare brāhmaṇamānaya /
S04bsu022_u:4849: sādhvārya iti pratiśrutya uttarā pūrvāṃ diśamagamat /
S04bsu022_u:4855: tena khalu punaḥ samayena śuddhāvāsakāyikairdevaputraiḥ sarve 'nyatīrthikā nigṛhītā abhūvan /
S04bsu022_u:4857: tataḥ sā āgatvā svāminīmevamāha - na khalvārye anyaḥ kaścid dṛśyate śramaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā,
S04bsu022_u:4860: sujātā āha - gacchottare sa eva brāhmaṇaḥ,
S04bsu022_u:4864: sādhvārye ityuttarā gatvā bodhisattvasya caraṇayoḥ praṇipatya sujātāyā [Vaidya_196] nāmnopanimantrayate sma /
